story:
** A THANK YOU FROM THE ORIGINAL MONA SAX **

We cannot believe it!! Kathy Tong who was the original model "Mona Sax" in the Max Payne 2 Games has sent us some love from the USA and to wish us luck on the project!

Help us in the last 2 weeks to reach our goal so we can fly her over to the UK and BE IN OUR FILM!! 

In the words of Mona "God I turned out to be such a damsel in distress"




As huge fans of the MAX PAYNE game we are looking to re-create the magic that first ignited our passion in 2001. Now many years on, we felt it was time for the fans to get a true MAX PAYNE fan film they deserve. We want to make 'YOU' the ultimate MAX PAYNE fan film, one that even Sam Lake himself could be proud of.  


Following on from the games continued success, the portrayal of MAX PAYNE will stay true to his nature and fully embrace his character. Telling a more sinister tale of what "Max" goes through in his day to day experiences, we will explore a slightly deeper insight into his life. Leaving no stone un-turned on our quest for the ultimate Fan Film, we want to do our very best to replicate the magic and film-noir feel that MAX PAYNE was best known for.   


Leroy Kincaide, Writer/Director: @leroykincaide

An experienced film maker, who has worked in the realm of entertainment for well over a decade. Leroy has gained experience and worked both on and off the camera. From appearing on a small host of TV shows/feature films and winning the 2013 Professional Photographer Magazines Award for (BEST FASHION FILM). Drawn to dark concepts and interesting stories, Leroy shares an interest in acting, film directing, producing and script writing.


MAX PAYNE TEASER TRAILER: 

Chloe Chudasama, Producer/Photographer: @chloecphoto

With a highly seasoned background in event production Chloe has helped manage some of the worlds largest brand marketing campaigns. Along with a background in event production, Chloe also has over 5 years of photography experience and like Leroy, is drawn to dark and creative concepts.

www.chloecphotography.com

After working together for over five years both Chloe and Leroy formed their production company Nocturnal Pictures  in 2014, and are looking to produce films in the Action/Horror genre.  



As a non-profit fan film, we want to put all your donations into the production costs, to help us create for "YOU" one of the best Max Payne Fan Films ever!

We are looking to make a dark action/thriller that's a cross between John Wick and SAW, but still keeping to the original MAX PAYNE elements. For us to be able to do this we will need to hire various intriguing locations such as factories, New York style bars and of course gritty apartments and houses so that we can create a world that tells the characters stories. 

Your generosity will help make this film a reality. 


In order to give you the best we can, we have spent a lot of time conjuring up some AMAZING perks and interactive experiences to get you all involved with our film.

We have signed posters, artwork and DVDs to give away, plus experiences such as a day on set to meet the cast and crew, and not only that we have a MAX PAYNE styled Photoshoot for you and a friend.

And for the more hardcore film enthusiasts, we are offering a SKYPE Q&A with, either the Director (Leroy) or Producer (Chloe). Or if you still wanted more PAYNE action, you could always choose the weapon "Max" uses to kill one of the bad guys.


We hope that you’re as excited about our short film as we are! And if you’re not in a position to contribute, your help and support is still valued. Simply by sharing our indiegogo project (http://igg.me/at/maxpayneuk), helps us spread the word around, letting others know about our story.

As huge Fan's of Max Payne, WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU. Please let us know what it is about the Max Payne story that you like, furthermore what are you hoping to see in our film?

Please like our FB Page: www.facebook.com/maxpayneuk

Follow us on TWITTER: https://twitter.com/maxpayne_uk

Send us any of your questions you might have about our Fan Film and we look forward to speaking with you all soon.

Thank you for your help!

Chloe & Leroy

story:
♥ The Story 

What is it about?
Lovigation tells the story of a luckless-in-love chauffeur that takes the romantic advice of his GPS in order to win the heart of the woman who has hired him.


Story
Our driver is desperately in love with his passenger, but his attempts to engage her in a conversation are clumsy and awkward. Thankfully his GPS comes to the rescue offering surprising advice on romantic (and sexual) issues to help him navigate towards love.

Genre
Romantic Comedy with a funky splash of Fantasy

Formula
LOVIGATION: "Her" meets "Last Night on Earth"



♥ A Few Loving Words From the Director


♥ Where We Come From

We already shot Lovigation on a microbudget in Germany. The trailer of which, you can see above. Since we are very convinced of the story and are eager to share the love (yes, this project is full of love), we translated the script and want to reshoot Lovigation with another talented cast and crew professionally and in English. This is where YOU come into play:



♥ What We Need

We need £7,500 in order to pay for:

  • Our lovely actors
  • Our talented crew
  • Catering & craft services
  • Lighting Equipment
  • Camera Equipment
  • Purchasing and renting props
  • Renting a car
  • A drone camera and pilot for bird's eye view shots of the car
  • Filming permits

♥ & What You Get

There is tons of awesome stuff for you to check out in the perk section on the right hand side. With your help we will also be able to:

  • Tell a lovely light-hearted story about finding love
  • Get the chance to see the film you funded in international film festivals around the world
  • Don't forget to check out the rest of the perks for every donation you make
  • ♥ OUR SPECIAL PERK OF LOVE! ♥ A unique way to confess your love: We give you the chance to see your own individual love message in the credits of the film.
  • And of course a protected link to the film after it is completed.


♥ Who the hell are you guys - Cast

The Passenger played by Faith Knight

Prior to training at The Central School of Speech and Drama, Faith won a scholarship to work with Dogtroep Theatre company in Amsterdam and subsequently was accepted into the prestigious Drama school. Since Graduation her work has largely been in film, including the feature film Pubmonkey, The Girlfriend Audition and Screaming Guns. The short films include 3’s A Crowd which was shown in Cannes Film Festival and Polaroid was nominated for ‘Best Acting’ at Watersprite film festival.



The Driver played by Tom Sawyer

Tom Sawyer trained with The Actors Centre, The Poor School, Mid-Kent College, The Margie Haber Studio in Los Angeles and The Actors Temple London (where he now also teaches). As well as UK theatre tours and successful London theatre shows Tom has appeared on some of Britain’s most watched TV shows including Eastenders, Hollyoaks, The Bill, Casualty and Family Affairs. Film work includes .357 (Winner of best short film at New York Independent film awards) Vinyl (Winner of best International film at Portobello film festival) and Little Deaths (British horror anthology). 



♥ Who the hell are you guys - Crew

Writer - Michael Schilling

The script was written by the extremely funny and talented Michael Schilling who is an award winning copywriter and cartoonist in Germany. You can check out his amazing work here.



Director - Daniel D. Reimer
Daniel is an independent filmmaker and graduated from the London Film Academy where he completed the one-year Filmmaking Diploma course. His graduation film entered into several international film festivals and won Best Film at 5th Lions International Short Film Festival in Istanbul. You can find more of his work here.



Director of Photography - Jason Kokkinakis
Jason is an imaginative Director Of Photography and licensed Steadicam© Operator who uses his camera and lighting skills to investigate the psychology of human relationships. He studied "Theatre Studies" at the University of Patras (Greece) and Filmmaking at the London Film Academy. Apart from his obvious camera skills Jason is also in a long-lasting committed relationship. So we are hopeful that he will "shed some light" on the whole love-thing.



Co-Producer - Elizabeth Lockard (LA based producer)
Elizabeth, originally from the United States, attended the London Film Academy. While in school, she met director and friend, Daniel D. Reimer, and produced one of his short films, Bell Tower Enigma. Elizabeth graduated with a diploma in Filmmaking and returned to the United States. Elizabeth now lives in Los Angeles California, working in the film and commercial industry and is waiting for a GPS to point her in the direction of her undoubtedly hot and charming future husband. 



♥ The Style 

As you might have recognised by now (yepee, you got this far) we would like to employ a humouristic tone with a touch of fantasy, without ignoring the emotional sides of the characters.

Visually we are aiming for a colourful look, without ignoring the naturalistic romantic comedy feel. We are eager to use steadicam and hand-held camera techniques to underline the light-heartedness and emphasise our characters.


♥ The Impact

They say in the entertainment industry it is difficult to make people cry, but it is even harder to make them laugh. However this is exactly what we are trying to achieve. Lovigation is a quirky film which takes the audience on a funny ride and should make them smile. Although the story is very light-hearted we also give the viewers a healthy amount of "food for thought". The ending is very special and has the potential to make you think and hopefully smile.


♥ Risks & Challenges

Obviously shooting (acting, lighting, recording sound, directing) a film in a driving car is a major challenge for the whole cast and crew. Therefore we are looking for remote locations where we can drive and shoot safely so that everybody can focus on their jobs. To achieve a GPS map-like feeling we also want to use a drone to shoot from a bird's eye perspective right down on the moving car. There are tons of laws and regulations in place to protect everybody involved. The biggest challenge here is indeed to come up with the money to hire a professional drone pilot.

Here you can see the kind of impecible bird's eye shot from David Fincher's "Zodiac" that we to aspire to*:


 *with the exception that David Fincher makes dark and and gloomy movies, while we are going for something more light and cheerful.

♥ Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot or just don't feel like chipping in financially, there is plenty of other ways you could help and earn yourself a valuable credit in the movie. We would immensely appreciate, if you could help us out with the following:

  • If you wanna share the love, don't be shy and use Facebook and Twitter to help us spread the word about Lovigation on the web #lovigation
  • A colourful or funky car with full comprehensive insurance
  • A GPS - it doesn't need to talk or give sexual advice though
  • If you are or know anybody who is a drone pilot, send them flying our way!

♥ Production Timeline
We hope that we will have gathered enough money to go into production one or two months after the campaign has ended. So our quest for love will hopefully be shot in April or May. Afterwards we will be kneedeep in post-production for around another month so that the premiere should be around June or July 2015. Summer love!


♥ What Now?
We hope we could give you a little feeling of what we are trying to do and of course get you excited to chip in and help us out. If you have any other questions or want to know more about the story or the ending or anything else don't hesitate to get in touch: lovigation@gmail.com

♥ Come help us navigate towards love!

_____________________________________________________________________________
*Music used in the trailer and interview video:

"As I Figure", "Monster Promenade", "Sweeter Vermouth", "Tango de Manzana"Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

story:
The Dark Inside Me, is a very unique psychological horror adventure game from a horror movie director Akçay Karaazmak, based on dynamic interactive scenario.



Game is 2d,5 next-gen and unique 3rd person point & click psychological horror adventure game. Main aim is to reflect the real characteristic of a player through the game and see how far players would push their limits through the stages of game. Game is +18 and has disturbing gore, sex and intense violence scenes.

Game is based on a dynamic scenario and the game-flow changes according to player decisions and how they face with the situations and solve the puzzles. Puzzles can be solved with more then one way and each way will effect and change the rest of the gameplay.


Sometimes players has to give serious decisions which will completely affect the following game stages. And those decisions could be the reflection of the player’s real characteristic.

It’s said everyone has angels. One of them leads us to the light and the other take us into dark. We give our own decisions through the path of the life and now we’ll give our own decisions through The Dark Inside Me.

Dark Inside Me is blurring the thin line between madness and reality, darkness and light, love and hate, forgive and vengeance.



You awake in a hospital room, handcuffed to a bed. You hear some detectives speaking about you. They are speaking that they are surprised that how you can be still alive after that terrifying event. And one of the said it would be better if they caught you dead. You don’t understand and don’t remember much but to learn first you should find a way to escape. 

The first question come to minds is if you are guilty or not? But its much more beyond the guiltiness or guiltless. You have given a chance to face with your past and how far you would go and sacrifice from yourself to enlighten the darkness and fight with your demons.



The Dark Inside Me gameplay builds upon the decisions and sacrifices between the user and the events. Puzzles in the game may solved with more then one way. And each way will lead you different ways and change the flow of the scenario. You can kill some one that stopping you from your way, by finding a tool to use on. Or you will find a way to pass him or her without killing. And if you didn't kill then that person could help you later in the game to solve a puzzle or can kill you or and make the things harder for you. When time comes for the vengeance, you will decide to forgive or no. You will torture or kill or let him or her go .You will face with the decisions you gave through the game. You take or find many tools and items, use them on other objects, combine them to create new items to solve new things.

Game is very synchronized with the amazing sounds effects and music. It will take you into the game and make you feel that you are the part of it.

Even the game is a point & click adventure game, there will be some action scenes as well including torture, fight and sex.

For example; you start to play in indoor scenes and then continue outdoors then take a bus and play in the bus and then goto other places. Goto airport find a way to enter plane. Travel with plane and play in it. Then continue your journey in another country, search things and then travel to a town. You should find a way to enter a club and solve the puzzles. There will be also some fun scenes as well; for example you will play in a rock bar with a band. You’ll be the lead singer and guitarist on the stage. Sure this scene isn't designed just for fun, it’s a part of a puzzle.

Game always will bring you new things and surprises. It will always keep the tension up and let you to lead the game-flow and the events. The Dark Inside me, will push the limits to give you a unique experience and make it more then just a game.


Game has many different environments. Beautiful real and surreal 3d pre-rendered 2d visuals with animated assets to make the scenes more live and dynamic. You play in rooms, buildings, streets, forests, various outdoors, in vehicles like bus, plane, ship etc...

  • Indoor environments (Houses, apartments, rooms, clubs etc..)
  • Outdoor environments (Streets, fields, village, circus, forest etc..)
  • Vehicles (Buses, cars, ships, planes etc..)


  • Next-gen point & click psychological horror adventure game.
  • Dynamic scenario.
  • Solving puzzles with various ways.
  • Play like a game, feel it like a movie
  • Highly detailed rendered 2D graphics and animations.
  • 2d,5 parallax and panning camera effects.
  • 3d playable characters.
  • More then one playable main character through the game play.
  • Mature content including gore, violence and sexuality.
  • Cinematic soundtracks depending on the mood of the scenes.
  • Multiple camera angle areas and scenes.
  • Many different environments; from houses, streets, shops, buildings to forests, buses, ships and much more.
  • 1920x1080 Full Hd graphics.
  • 1920x1080 Full Hd cinematics.











Music and sound design will be scored by Akçay Karaazmak as well. Female vocals will be made by Slovak singer Michaela Rexova. Her voice will touch you deeply.

Sound acts will be made by professional male and female dabbers.

The Dark Inside Me - Fall of the drama queen (Soundtrack from one of the scenes)

Akçay Karaazmak - Creative director & Project lead (www.akcaykaraazmak.com)

Blue Arc Studios (www.blue-arc.com) – Visual Fx and Interactive Production Company

 Facebook

 Twitter

 Youtube


 Vote us on Greenlight


  • Where can I find more info? 
    www.thedarkinside.me

  • How can I contact you?  
    info@thedarkinside.me

  • What is the production company's website?
    www.blue-arc.com / www.bluearc-studios.com

  • Where can I download the demo game? 
    It will be announced after the funding completed.

  • When will the game finished?

    The Dark Inside Me is planned to be released end of 2015 

  • What platforms will be supported:
    PC Windows, Mac OSX and Linux.

  • How much of the game is done already?
    20 mixed scenes from the different chapters. It's hard to tell the number of final scenes because always new and very unique ideas are coming to our minds and we want to put all these ideas in The Dark Inside Me.


Like any creative project, problems can arise throughout development that you can't plan for. However The Dark Inside Me been developing by a 15 years old interactive and animation company Blue Arc Studios with the lead of Akçay Karaazmak. We have already developed the main structure of the game. Now we just need to create more and more ideas and put them into scenes. We have decided build the game with the crowdfunding to spend all our energy just for the game. Crowdfunding speeds up development process.

You have given a chance to face with your past and how far you would go and
sacrifice from yourself to enlighten the darkness and fight with your demons.





The Dark Inside Me gameplay builds upon the decisions and sacrifices between the user and the events. Puzzles in the game may solved with more then one way. And each way will lead you different ways and change the flow of the scenario. You can kill some one that stopping you from your way, by finding a tool to use on. Or you will find a way to pass him or her without killing. And if you didn't kill then that person could help you later in the game to solve a puzzle or can kill you or and make the things harder for you. When time comes for the vengeance, you will decide to forgive or no. You will torture or kill or let him or her go .You will face with the decisions you gave through the game. You take or find many tools and items, use them on other objects, combine them to create new items to solve new things.


Game is very synchronized with the
amazing sounds effects and music. It will take you into the game and make you
feel that you are the part of it.
Even the game is a point & click
adventure game, there will be some action scenes as well including torture,
fight and sex. 





For example; you start to play in indoor scenes and then continue outdoors then take a bus and play in the bus and then goto other places. Goto airport find a way to enter plane. Travel with plane and play in it. Then continue your journey in another country, search things and then travel to a town. You should find a way to enter a club and solve the puzzles. There will be also some fun scenes as well; for example you will play in a rock bar with a band. You’ll be the lead singer and guitarist on the stage. Sure this scene isn't designed just for fun, it’s a part of a puzzle.


Game always will bring you new things and surprises. It will always keep the tension up and let you to lead the game-flow and the events. The Dark Inside me, will push the limits to give you a unique experience and make it more then just a game.



Game has many different environments. Beautiful real and surreal 3d pre-rendered 2d visuals with animated assets to make the scenes more live and dynamic. You play in rooms, buildings, streets, forests, various outdoors, in vehicles like bus, plane, ship etc...









Indoor environments (Houses, apartments, rooms, clubs etc..)
Outdoor environments (Streets, fields, village, circus, forest etc..)
Vehicles (Buses, cars, ships, planes etc..)









Next-gen point & click psychological horror adventure game.
Dynamic scenario.

Solving puzzles with various ways.

Play like a game, feel it like a movie

Highly detailed rendered 2D graphics and animations.

2d,5 parallax and panning camera effects.

3d playable characters.

More then one playable main character through the game play.

Mature content including gore, violence and sexuality.

Cinematic soundtracks depending on the mood of the scenes.

Multiple camera angle areas and scenes.

Many different environments; from houses, streets, shops, buildings to
forests, buses, ships and much more.

1920x1080 Full Hd graphics.

1920x1080 Full Hd cinematics.






















Music and
sound design will be scored by Akçay Karaazmak as well. Female vocals will be
made by Slovak singer Michaela Rexova. Her voice will touch you deeply.
Sound acts
will be made by professional male and female dabbers.
The Dark Inside Me - Fall of the drama queen (Soundtrack from one of the scenes)


Akçay Karaazmak - Creative
director & Project lead (www.akcaykaraazmak.com)
Blue Arc Studios (www.blue-arc.com)
– Visual Fx and Interactive Production Company



 Facebook
 Twitter
 Youtube





 Vote us on Greenlight




Where can I find more info? www.thedarkinside.me

How can I contact
you?  info@thedarkinside.me
What is the production company's website?www.blue-arc.com / www.bluearc-studios.com 


Where can I download the demo game? It will be announced after the funding completed.


When will the game finished?
The
Dark Inside Me is planned to be released end of 2015 

What platforms will be
supported:
PC Windows, Mac OSX and Linux.


How much of the game is done already?20 mixed scenes from the different chapters. It's hard to tell the number of final scenes because always new and very unique ideas are coming to our minds and we want to put all these ideas in The Dark Inside Me.



Like
any creative project, problems can arise throughout development that you can't
plan for. However The Dark Inside Me been developing by a 15 years old
interactive and animation company Blue Arc Studios with the lead of Akçay
Karaazmak. We have already developed the main structure of the game. Now we
just need to create more and more ideas and put them into scenes. We have
decided build the game with the crowdfunding to spend all our energy just for the game. Crowdfunding speeds up development process.

story:
¿Quién no quiso desaparecer alguna vez? Pifiarla es un hecho presente en tantas culturas como regiones tiene nuestro planeta, no obstante, por muy común que sea no todos hemos aprendido a aceptarlo.

Tierra Trágame es un programa televisivo que mezcla entrevistas y sketches cómicos. El concepto “meter la pata” es el nexo entre ambos bloques. En las entrevistas, la persona que presente el programa conversará con una persona conocida por la audiencia y otra desconocida por los espectadores. Los sketches desarrollarán situaciones verosímiles ideadas por nuestro guionista, quien para su creación ha partido de experiencias tanto ficticias como reales.

Las entrevistas se harán en una localización interior, preferiblemente un plató. El conductor del espacio mantendrá una actitud respetuosa y cordial con los invitados. El deseo es que el entrevistado conocido pase un buen rato en la grabación, promocionando además su actualidad profesional, y que el espectador disfrute con la cercanía del invitado; en cuanto al entrevistado desconocido, la intención es que pase un rato ameno en la grabación, compartiendo sus vivencias con la audiencia y conociendo a un rostro popular.

Los sketches tendrán una estética naturalista y una puesta en escena más cercana al cine que al clásico sketch televisivo. Para dar vida a los diferentes personajes contamos con un solvente reparto fijo, al que cada edición se sumará un artista invitado.

Para nuestro spot de presentación, que puedes ver al inicio de la página, hemos tenido el inmenso placer de contar con el apoyo de los músicos Dani Flaco y Mägo de Oz.


¿QUÉ NECESITAMOS?

Estamos en fase de pre-producción del programa piloto. Nuestro objetivo es alcanzar con tu inestimable colaboración 7.500€ (8.500$), presupuesto que nos garantiza los medios para conseguir un buen producto que pueda interesar a una cadena de televisión convencional.


Como puedes apreciar, la mayoría de los fondos recaudados irán destinados a mejorar la calidad de la producción, lo cual podrás comprobar esta misma primavera.

Para incentivar tu apoyo, hemos preparado una serie de recompensas, que puedes ver a la derecha.


¿QUIÉNES SOMOS?

Veteranía y juventud van de la mano en nuestro equipo, cuya mayor parte está formada por jóvenes menores de 30 años que conocen de sobra lo que implica rodar con un presupuesto ajustado o prácticamente inexistente. Este proyecto nos entusiasma a todos por considerarlo una buena oportunidad profesional de la que queremos hacerte partícipe. 

Listado de equipo (21/03/2015):

Reparto: Alexandra Martín, Julián Santos.

Idea original y guión: Jordi Cantavella

Realización: Sergio Huguet, Félix de Molina y Ferrán Ureña

Coaching y Casting: Yago Ruiz

Producción Ejecutiva: Miquel Poveda

Diseño de Producción: David Artigas

Producción: Max de Rosselló

Dirección de Comunicación: Sergi Remolà

Dirección de Fotografía: Eduardo Álvarez

Dirección de Fotografía spots y foto promocional: Claudia Pujol

Diseño Sonoro y Producción Musical: Mario Maretti “La Cueva Estudio de Grabación”

Sonido directo: Asier Sánchez

Música: Juan Gómez "El Sobrino del Diablo"

Maquillaje: Sarai Parada

Vestuario: Shantale Fígoli

Dirección de Arte: Pablo Bracalenti

Escenografía: Agustina Santinelli

Diseño Gráfico: Maite Sant

Ilustraciones en vivo de los invitados: Llorenç Peret

Community Manager: Mario Temiño



"NO T´AVERGONYEIXIS, DIGUES-HO" 

Qui no ha volgut desaparèixer alguna vegada? Pifiarla és un fet present en tantes cultures com regions té el nostre planeta, no obstant, per molt comú que sigui no tots hem après a acceptar-ho.

“Tierra Trágame” es un programa televisiu per a tots els públics que barreja entrevistes i sketchos còmics. El concepte “Ficar la pota” és el nexe entre ambdós blocs. Amb una durada total de 40 minuts. En les entrevistes, la persona que presenta el programa conversarà amb una persona coneguda per l’audiència i una altre desconeguda pels espectadors. Els sketchos desenvoluparan situacions vera símils ideades pel nostre guionista Jordi Cantavella, autor de quinze llibres com Em vull fondre 100 ficades de peus a la galleda glorioses, El Brigadista i la biografia d´Albert Llovera No Límits, qui per la seva creació ha partit d’experiències tan fictícies com reals.

Per donar vida als diferents personatges contem amb un solvent repartiment fix, que desvetllarem poc a poc, al que cada edició s’hi sumarà un artista convidat.

Les entrevistes es faran en una localització interior, preferiblement un plató. El conductor de l´espai mantindrà una actitud respectuosa i cordial amb els convidats. El desig es que l´entrevistat conegut passi una bona estona en la gravació, promocionant a més la seva actualitat professional, i que l´espectador disfruti de la proximitat del convidat; en quant a l´entrevistat desconegut, la intenció és que passi una estona amena en la gravació, compartint les seves vivències amb l´audiència i coneixent un rostre popular.

Els sketchos tindran una estètica naturalista i una posada en escena més propera al cine que al clàssic sketch televisiu. Per donar vida als diferents personatges contem amb un solvent repartiment fix, que desvetllarem poc a poc, al que cada edició s’hi sumarà un artista convidat.

Per al nostre espot de presentació, que pots veure al inici de la pagina hem tingut l´immens plaer de comptar amb el recolzament dels músics Dani Flaco i Mägo de Oz.


¿QUÉ NECESITEM?

Estem en fase de preproducció del programa pilot. El nostre objectiu es arribar a 7.500€ (8.500$), pressupost que ens garantitza els mitjans per aconseguir un bon producte que pugui interessar a una cadena de televisió convencional.

Com pots apreciar, la majoria dels fons recaptats aniran destinats a millorar la qualitat de la producció, el qual podràs comprovar aquesta mateixa primavera.

Per incentivar el teu recolzament, hem preparat una sèrie de recompenses que pots veure a la dreta.


QUI SÓM?

Veterania i joventut van de la mà en el nostre equip, la major part està formada per joves menors de 30 anys que coneixen de sobres el que implica rodar amb un pressupost ajustat o pràcticament inexistent. Aquest projecte ens entusiasma a tots per considerar-lo una bona oportunitat professional de la que us en volem fer-ne partícips.

Listat d´equip (21/03/2015):

Repartiment: Alexandra Martín, Julián Santos

Idea original y guió: Jordi Cantavella

Realització: Sergio Huguet, Félix de Molina i Ferrán Ureña

Coaching y Càsting: Yago Ruiz

Producció Executiva: Miquel Poveda

Disseny de Producció: David Artigas

Producció: Max de Rosselló

Direcció de Comunicació: Sergi Remolà

Direcció de Fotografia: Eduardo Álvarez

Direcció de Fotografia spots i foto promocional: Claudia Pujol

Disseny Sonor y Producció Musical: Mario Maretti “La Cueva Estudio de Grabación”

So directe: Asier Sánchez

Música: Juan Gómez "El Sobrino del Diablo"

Maquillatge: Sarai Parada

Vestuari: Shantale Fígoli

Direcciò d´Art: Pablo Bracalenti

Escenografia: Agustina Santinelli

Disseny Gràfic: Maite Sant

Il·lustracions en viu dels convidats: Llorenç Peret

Community Manager: Mario Temiño



"DON´T BE EMBARRASED, SAY IT"

Who didn’t want to disappear at least once? Messing up is a fact present everywhere around the world. However, not everyone have learnt how to accept it.

“Tierra Trágame” is a TV show for every audience which mix interviews and comic sketches. The “messing up” concept is the connection between both blocks. The show is 40 minutes length. The presenter will interview two people. One of them will be a public character known by the audience and the other one will be an unknown person. We wish that the interviewed person have a nice time during the filming of the show and promote his/her current professional career. We also want that the audience enjoy the public character’s approach to the people.

Regarding the unknown interviewed person, we would like him/her having a nice time during the filming, sharing his/her life experiences with the audience and meeting a famous. The sketches will develop possible situations, made up by our scriptwriter Jordi Cantavella, who has written fifteen books, such as Em vull fonder 100 ficades de peus a la galled glorioses, El Brigadista, and the Albert Llovera´s biography called No limits. The scriptwriter has taken the ideas from real and unreal experiences. We count on a reliable and permanent cast which will be revealed soon. In addition, one special guest will be invited every different episode of the show.

We are at the pre-production stage of the pilot. We are proud to announce that we have had the valuable support of the musicians Dani Flaco and Mägo de Oz to make our first promotional spot, which you can view at the top of the page. Our objective is to reach an amount of € 7,500 ($ 8,500), estimate which guarantee the supports we need to make a good product that can be desirable for a normal TV channel.

TECHNICAL TEAM:

The major part of our tea mis formed by young people in their twenties who know what involves filming with a tight or a non-existent budget. We are enthusiastic about this project and we all consider this is a good opportunity for you to take part of it.

Staff (21/03/2015)

Cast: Alexandra Martín, Julián Santos

Original concept and screenplay: Jordi Cantavella

Audiovisual production: Sergio Huguet, Félix de Molina and Ferrán Ureña

Coaching and Casting: Yago Ruiz

Executive Producer: Miquel Poveda

Production Designer: David Artigas

Producer: Max de Rosselló

Director of Communication: Sergi Remolà

Director of Photography: Eduardo Álvarez

Director of Photagraphy in trailers and cover photograph: Claudia Pujol

Sound Designer and Music Producer: Mario Maretti “La Cueva Estudio de Grabación”

Sound technician: Asier Sánchez

Music: El Sobrino del Diablo

Make up: Sarai Parada

Costume Design: Shantale Fígoli

Art: Pablo Bracalenti

Scenery: Agustina Santinelli

Graphic Designer: Maite Sant

Live Art (illustrations of the guests): Llorenç Peret

Community Manager: Mario Temiño

story:
Cos'è il Mongol Rally?

Il Mongol Rally è la più grande avventura motorizzata del pianeta. Una gara di beneficenza che ogni estate riunisce team da tutto il mondo, con la voglia di attraversare 1/3 del globo con veicoli tecnicamente non idonei.

Partenza Roma, Italia - Destinazione Ulan-Udé, Siberia.

Requisiti:
- Veicolo inferiore ai 1000cc di cilindrata
- Beneficenza di almeno 1000 sterline 
- Solo se stessi su cui contare

What is the Mongol Rally?

The Mongol Rally is the greatest motorized adventure of the planet. A charity race that every summer brings together teams from all around the world, with the desire to cross 1/3 of the globe with technically inadequate vehicles.

Starts in Rome, Italy - Destination Ulan-Ude, Siberia.

Requirements:
- Vehicle below 1000cc engine capacity
- Charity of at least £ 1,000 
- Only themselves to rely on


Cos'è SPQRally?

SPQRally è il nome che abbiamo scelto per il nostro team in partenza il prossimo 19 luglio. 

SPQRally non è solo questo ma anche la nostra idea di viaggio, l'avventura  dalla quale nascerà il documentario che racconterà com'è andata veramente. 

Nessun percorso definito, nessun supporto, nessun'assistenza. 
La nostra vita non sarà più come prima, figuriamoci la macchina. 

What is SPQRally?

SPQRally is the name we chose for our team departing on 19th July.

SPQRally is not only that but also our idea of traveling, the adventure from which will be born the documentary that will tell what really happened.

No defined path, no support, no assistance.
Our life will never be as before. Neither the car.


Puoi fare la differenza

Equipaggiamento, viveri e rullini fotografici? Non solo a questo servirà il tuo contributo.

Il tuo aiuto è di fondamentale importanza per raggiungere un importo da devolvere ad un'associazione romana che sceglieremo insieme a te, sulla base delle tue proposte. Abbiamo bisogno della massima partecipazione e dei tuoi suggerimenti per realizzare tutto questo.

Il nostro progetto è portare Roma nel mondo, ma soprattutto far crescere il mondo dentro Roma. 

You can make a difference

Equipment, supplies and photographic films? Your contribution will be used not only for that.

Your help is crucial to reach an amount of money to be donated to a Roman association that we will choose with you, with the help of your suggestions. We need maximum participation and you to make this happen.

Our project is to bring Rome around in the world, but especially to grow the world inside of Rome.


Di cosa abbiamo bisogno?

Abbiamo fissato come obiettivo il raggiungimento di una somma pari a 10000€, circa 0,77 centesimi di euro a chilometro.
Dove andranno i tuoi fondi? A cominciare dal veicolo in uso, benzina, equipaggiamento vario e pezzi di ricambio, viveri, tende e sacchi a pelo, visti, permessi e tutto quello che di imprevisto può nascere in circa 13000 km di viaggio.
Raggiunta la soglia minima? Sarai tu a suggerirci cosa fare con il resto dei fondi raccolti, indicandoci chi credi abbia davvero bisogno del nostro aiuto e chi ritieni più meritevole della nostra beneficenza.

Se non dovessimo riuscire a raccogliere tutta la somma per intero, ma almeno il necessario a partire ed a girare per te questo documentario unico nel suo genere, l'SPQRally partirà e affronterà ugualmente questa avventura.

Se, invece, tutto ciò non sarà possibile, la totalità dei fondi già raccolti sarà comunque devoluta in beneficenza, per non lasciare vano lo sforzo di chi in questo progetto ha creduto veramente. 

What do we need?

We have set as our goal to achieve a sum of € 10,000, about 0.77 cents per kilometer.

But how will your funds be really used? Beginning with the vehicle, fuel, equipment and various spare parts, food, tents and sleeping bags, visas, permits and all that of unexpected that can be born in about 13,000 km journey.

Once reached the minimum threshold? You will suggest what to do with the rest of the funds raised, indicating who do you think really needs our help and who you feel more deserving of our charity.

If we fail to collect the entire amount, but at least the necessary to start the run, the SPQRally will face the adventure anyhow.
If, however, all this would not be possible, all the funds already collected will be entirely donated to charity, so we do not frustrate the effort of those who really believed in this project.


Come altro ci puoi aiutare?

Diffondi questa pagina, pubblicizza le nostre idee, condividi il progetto, fai conoscere ai tuoi amici l'SPQRally team. 
Date un'occhiata a tutti i perks, troverete ogni tipo di ricompensa tra cui scegliere.

How else can you help?

Share this page, advertises our ideas, share the project, let your friends know about the SPQRally team.
Take a look at all the perks, you will find all kinds of rewards to choose from.


                 Get some stupid in your summer
story_txt:
Cos'è il Mongol Rally? Il Mongol Rally è la più grande avventura motorizzata del pianeta. Una gara di beneficenza che ogni estate riunisce team da tutto il mondo, con la voglia di attraversare 1/3 del globo con veicoli tecnicamente non idonei.
Partenza Roma, Italia - Destinazione Ulan-Udé, Siberia.
Requisiti:- Veicolo inferiore ai 1000cc di cilindrata- Beneficenza di almeno 1000 sterline - Solo se stessi su cui contareWhat is the Mongol Rally?The Mongol Rally is the greatest motorized adventure of the planet. A charity race that every summer brings together teams from all around the world, with the desire to cross 1/3 of the globe with technically inadequate vehicles.Starts in Rome, Italy - Destination Ulan-Ude, Siberia.Requirements:- Vehicle below 1000cc engine capacity- Charity of at least £ 1,000 - Only themselves to rely onCos'è SPQRally?

story:
The Dream

Buying the house was supposed to be a dream come true. But for Drew and Kara Townsend the nightmare has just begun.

Drew’s responsibilities as a dailies editor in Hollywood means he works nights while his wife – a nurse – works with the elderly during the day. But neither really ever seem to be home alone. When Drew wakes up paralyzed by an unseen force, his wife mentions that sleep paralysis is fairly common, and almost always includes feeling like an evil being is present.

Drew decides to power through the nightmares, and chalks it all up to a figment of his sleep paralysis. But Kara is experiencing something too, and she begins to question if it’s all in their heads, or if something sinister is watching them sleep.


The Need 

Allow us to start with a declarative statement: This film is happening. Now we need YOUR help to make it the best experience possible. 

As a startup production house, we are very fortunate to have some private backing as well as myriad connections within the industry. More than anything, we need permits and legal protection in order to do this properly. Aside from the cost of operations, we also believe that actors and artists should be paid for their work. Art is not a "great networking opportunity" or a "chance for exposure." Art is passion-turned-obsession and ultimately a life's work. This is a job.  Industry standard also requires that we feed the cast and crew, and hey, who doesn’t like food, right? Finally, we’d like to sink a little money into special effects and higher-caliber effects make up. Hey, I know a guy, ya know? We have the knowledge, and the connections, we just need your help with the funding. Our locations are secure, our actors and crew signed on and are chomping to get started,  and we own about half of the equipment we need thanks to our investors. The Figment is just the first of several films on the slate.

Essentially it breaks down like this:

Legal & Administrative - $5,500.00

Cast & Crew Expense - $3,000.00

Sound & Camera - $9,000.00

Editorial & Post-Production - $2,500.00

TOTAL: $20,000.00

The Reciprocation

Your support will help change the face of horror films and independent film-making. Our perks include merchandise, exclusive behind-the-scenes  and making of footage, signed memorabilia, and even a chance to meet us!

We have a assembled a team of Hollywood's next generation of stars and producers, and this is your chance to say "I knew him/her when..." On top of all that cool gear, you'll also have bragging rights, signed photos, and a warm glow in your heart of knowing you helped scare the daylights out the indie crowd.

Again, this is the first of several on the slate. We will remember who helped us, and we will love you until the world's end. 

The Impact

We are fortunate to live in the digital age. Our horror film hopes to bring better understanding of sleep paralysis and sleep disorders in general. We also hope to frighten you immensely along the way. Sleep paralysis is a little understood condition in which a person wakes from sleep unable to move. Often times it is accompanied by the feeling of a terrible presence in the room. Call them ghosts. Call them demons. Over the centuries, the condition has given rise to myths and legends including The Old Hag, The Incubus and Succubus legends, and according to some researchers, even the widely-known alien form, The Greys. But it's more than legend to those afflicted. True fear doesn't live out in the shadows, or in vampire's castles, or in werewolves' dens. True fear lives in your own bedroom, stands beside you while you sleep, watches you squirm in pain and panic, and dreams of stealing your very soul. Upon completion of the film, we hope the awareness of sleep paralysis can help lead to better treatments, a little bit of peace - before it's too late. 

The Gamble

There are risks to any investment, but make no mistake - this film is going to happen. We already have enough resource to make it, we just need your help to make it even better. You can think of us like that new Chinese restaurant in town. You know how Generals Tso's chicken tastes, but what if that new place makes it the best you've ever had? You're going to spend money on dinner anyway, why not get dinner somewhere new?

We are committed to making the best possible product - like any business, and we will do our best to serve your twisted, psychotic impulses. On film anyhow.


The Outreach

Help us spread the word, share the Indiegogo page. Post on Facebook, Twitter, find us on Google+ and Youtube. We want you to be part of our communities, but we also want you to be part of your own.

Tomorrow, when you get to work, ask your co-workers how they're doing. And if they say they didn't sleep well, ask them why - and then listen - really listen to why. Maybe they'll confide in you. Maybe you'll make a new friend. Maybe you'll help them relieve a burden, such as waking up in the middle of the night to find creatures scratching at their door, or a horned-demon resting against the vanity.

Or maybe you'll just be doing something nice. No harm in that, right?

The People


Lauren Parkinson - Kara Townsend, lead
Lauren is an actress from the Midwest by way of Chicago and then the Cincinnati ‘burbs... (does this look like a femur?) where she got her BFA in theater performance, then traversed her way regionally in the theater community before moving out to Los Angeles to pursue more film. Lauren has recently been uber busy with work, including SheWolves, Appetites, and Avengers Grimm.  imdb.me/laurenparkinson or http://www.facebook.com/laurenparkinsonactress

Jacob Cormier - Drew Townsend, lead
Jacob was born in Lowell, Massachusetts and reborn in Florida where he discovered Theatre in High School. He received his BA acting training from Fairleigh Dickinson University and has a strong foundation in physical comedy and improvisation. He has finally made his way across the country to pursue his dreams. Some of his favorite roles include originating Max in the play Henry's Law and most recently portraying Lady Macbeth at the Glendale Center Theatre. Jacob likes to make funny faces and eats more “hamburgers” than you do (Rat? This is a rat burger?). When Jacob’s not eating and acting in webseries, he likes to practice parkour.  about.me/Jacob.Cormier

Adam Kruze - Producer/Assistant Director
Adam was born and raised in Cincinnati and moved to Los Angeles in 2008 to be with his now-wife, the leading lady, Lauren Parkinson. He met David while working at one of the premier entertainment lighting companies in Los Angeles where he gained his appreciation for the art of filmmaking. Adam's written a feature length script, was a gaffer on a short film, and has taken classes on both lighting and screenwriting. Like David, Adam has experienced bouts of sleep paralysis and has on occasion been visited by shadow people (like Village People, only darker “fun to be haunted at the YMCA?”). The unsettling nature of these shared experiences helped inspire the project. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4140827/ 

David W. Keffer - Writer/Director/Producer

David was born and raised in rural Ohio amidst rolling fields of corn (Malachi, Malachi!). He found his love for theatre at an early age and began writing horror stories in Junior High, later graduating from Kent State University after double majoring in Creative Writing and Electronic Media Production. David suffered long bouts of insomnia (in part due to sleep paralysis) and would utilize that time by writing fiction and screenplays, eventually selling Ghost Game to Autumn Entertainment in 2004. David found a niche in the lighting industry, working with Kino Flo troubleshooting with gaffers and DP’s. He recently finished as a semi-finalist at the 2014 Screamfest Screenplay Contest with Newton, NV. imdb.com


Additional Team:

Jacqueline Anne Greer - Musical Composer

Cody Stucky - Graphic Design

The Mysterious E - Webmaster

story:
UPDATE

Paranormal Central: TV Series to stream online!

In addition to airing on TV, the Paranormal Central: TV series will now stream online as well. This is a huge deal for our international audience who've pointed out that without the ability to see the show online, there's no way for them to ever see the new programming. 

Each episode of Paranormal Central that airs on TV will be made available online to stream the same day.

Please share this information and the campaign on social media, and consider contributing today!


----------------------------------------------


About the Show

Paranormal Central is the #1 paranormal show on both Livestream and Art Bell’s Dark Matter Network. This internet talk show unearths the truth behind the mysteries and conspiracies of the supernatural and extraterrestrial.

Host and founder of the Sanger Paranormal Society, Jeffrey Gonzalez, is not just a talk show host. He's an investigator. Investigating the paranormal for over 10 years across the globe, he has found a way to show his discoveries to the world!

After being #1 on the Internet for so long, Paranormal Central is now ready to become #1 on syndicated television.

Who’s Involved

Behind every great show is an even greater team collaborating together to make it happen. This collection of individuals and groups are what will make this show truly an unbeatable success and help this show rise to the top.

Jeffrey Gonzalez

Founder of Paranormal Central and the Sanger Paranormal Society. You may have seen him on several TV shows like Monsters and Mystery's in America on the Discovery Channel, Chasing UFOs on National Geographic, or on several news stories around the world. College Humor even did a skit with Jeffrey on the topic of the paranormal.

Allen Thomas

The co-host of Paranormal Central and part of the investigation team. Allen actually saw a Bigfoot in 1987. His knowledge in the Occult and Religion brings a whole new twist to the show. 

Possessed Tranquility

The house band for Paranormal Central is an electronic, alternative rock band formed in 2012 by lead singer/programmer, Anthony, and guitarist, Kaylie. Both were solo artists that chose to combine their talents in digital creating, composition, writing, and production. Possessed Tranquility has shared the stage with the likes of Orgy, Wes Borland’s Black Light Burns, and many others. Their debut single, “Hear You Calling,” won the award for Best Song from Akademia Music.
 

What We Need & What You Get

Now, Paranormal Central has an opportunity to take the next step and take their talk show to television. People from all walks of life have had encounters with the paranormal: rock stars, celebrities, police officers, military personnel… Let’s get them on the couch and hear their real-life stories. It’ll be a one-hour show that you won’t want to end.

When Jeffrey Gonzalez approached KMPH FOX 26 with their pilot for Paranormal Central, they immediately liked it and offered to run it on their station. With the first episode produced, KMPH FOX 26 recommended that producing 26 episodes would keep the project fresh all year long! While the first 8 episodes were already budgeted for, the remaining 18 episodes were not.

This is where you come in.

We know that when Paranormal Central hits the FOX Network, it’ll be a hit. However, we need your help covering the remaining production costs to film the entire first season of the show. This includes, but is not limited to, studio costs, film crew, guest accommodations, on-location filming, post-production and distribution. Check out the side panel to the right to check out all the unique perks we offer when you choose to give today!
 

We Need Your Help!

If our monetary goal isn’t reached, a couple things can happen:

1.  We could miss this rare opportunity with the FOX Network, which may or may not arise again in the future

2.  We would have to sell part of the show to a third-party investor, giving up our creative control over the direction of the show

Neither of which we want.

This show is and has always been for our fans and paranormal enthusiasts worldwide. The only way for us to maintain that integrity is if we produce this show together. By making a donation, you can become a part of the show’s history.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can’t provide monetary support, advocacy is equally important. You help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! You can:

  • Tell your friends about Paranormal Central.
  • Share this campaign on social media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. by using the Indiegogo sharing tools.
  • Copy the link for this campaign on your blog or personal websites.
  • Encourage others to support the show!

Thank you for your support. Together, we can make this show a reality!

Discovery Channel, Chasing UFOs on
National Geographic, or on several news stories around the world. College Humor even did a skit with
Jeffrey on the topic of the paranormal. 
Allen
ThomasThe co-host of Paranormal Central and part of the investigation team. Allen actually
saw a Bigfoot in 1987. His knowledge in the Occult and Religion brings a whole
new twist to the show. Possessed
TranquilityThe house band for Paranormal Central is an electronic, alternative rock band
formed in 2012 by lead singer/programmer, Anthony, and guitarist, Kaylie. Both
were solo artists that chose to combine their talents in digital creating,
composition, writing, and production. Possessed Tranquility has shared the
stage with the likes of Orgy, Wes Borland’s Black Light Burns, and many others.
Their debut single, “Hear You Calling,” won the award for Best Song from
Akademia Music. 
What We
Need & What You Get
Now, Paranormal Central has an opportunity
to take the next step and take their talk show to television. People from all
walks of life have had encounters with the paranormal: rock stars, celebrities,
police officers, military personnel… Let’s get them on the couch and hear their
real-life stories. It’ll be a one-hour show that you won’t want to end. 
When Jeffrey Gonzalez approached KMPH FOX 26 with their pilot for Paranormal Central, they immediately liked it and
offered to run it on their station. With the first
episode produced, KMPH FOX 26 recommended that producing 26 episodes would keep the project fresh all year long! While the
first 8 episodes were already budgeted for, the remaining 18 episodes were not.


This is
where you come in.We know that when Paranormal Central hits the FOX Network, it’ll be a
hit. However, we need your help covering the
remaining production costs to film the entire first season of the show. This includes, but is not limited to, studio costs, film crew, guest
accommodations, on-location filming, post-production and distribution. Check out the side panel
to the right to check out all the unique perks we offer when you choose to give
today! 
We Need
Your Help!
If our monetary goal isn’t reached, a couple things
can happen:
1. 
We could miss this rare
opportunity with the FOX Network, which may or may not arise again in the
future
2. 
We would have to sell part of the
show to a third-party investor, giving up our creative control over the direction
of the show
Neither of which we want.
This show is and has always been for our fans and
paranormal enthusiasts worldwide. The only way for us to maintain that
integrity is if we produce this show together. By making a donation, you can become a part
of the show’s history. 
Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can’t provide monetary support,
advocacy is equally important. You help us get the word out and make some noise
about our campaign! You can:


Tell your friends about
Paranormal Central.
Share this campaign on social
media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc. by using the Indiegogo sharing
tools.
Copy the link for this campaign
on your blog or personal websites.
Encourage others to support the
show!
Thank you for your support. Together, we can make
this show a reality!

story:
Who We Are

We are people from all around the world who fear that we are witnessing the genocide of the Palestinian people by the State of Israel. Witnessing Israel’s daily violations of Palestinian human rights- military take-over of land, restriction of movement, economic strangulation, house demolitions, restrictions on basic foodstuff, mass arbitrary arrests of both adults and children, torture, extra judicial executions, and large-scale massacres of whole families, openly calling for genocide and extermination by law makers and other public figures- we can not keep silent about this 66 year-old atrocity, unfolding before our eyes.

Our campaign is a simple request that individuals and NGOs write to the United Nations Office of the Special Adviser on the Prevention of Genocide And the International Criminal Court Prosecutor, to take action and investigate the possibility that Israel is committing the Crime of Genocide against the Palestinian People, and that the office publish its findings and recommendations.

To add on to the pressure, we publish your letters on our website. Feel free to check us out! http://israelgenocide.wordpress.com/ 

Let's Make 2015 the Year We Stopped Israel's Genocide!

The Israel Genocide? campaign has been going well, but we think we can serve all of you better in 2015. We'd like to add a function to our website that allows you to easily send a ready-made email, if that's your preference. 

After some serious on-line-window-shopping, we've decided to go with Salsa, for $3000.

Let's make 2015 the year we stopped Israel's genocide of the Palestinian people! Please help us facilitate a more efficient campaign by donating enough to to use the service for the duration of 2015.

Your Impact

The UN is a politically motivated institution and our voices are not being heard. Our demand is a humble one. From our research we believe that Israel is committing the Crime of Genocide, but these being legal terminology, we want the highest authorities on the matter to provide its opinion. We believe the Special Adviser and the ICC Prosecutor are very aware of the situation, but due to political climate around the issue, must be emboldened to take action.

This is where you come in!

We want you- individuals and NGOs- to flood the offices of the UN Office of the Special Adviser on the Prevention of Genocide and the ICC Prosecutor with letters demanding they investigate the possibility that Israel is committing the Crime of Genocide against the Palestinian People, and that they publish their findings and recommendations.

We want to make this process as easy and quick as possible for you, so we can reach critical mass. Your donations will be used to create an automated email campaign, so you can just sign your name and click "send".

Don't Forget to Spread the Word

The Israel Genocide? campaign's first goal is to pressure the UN Office of the Special Adviser on the Prevention of Genocide and the ICC Prosecutor to investigate the possibility that Israel is committing the Crime of Genocide against the Palestinian People. But we also aim to spread awareness of this on-going crime.

You can help with this, too!

Please spread the word about our campaign http://israelgenocide.wordpress.com/ and this fundraising effort to improve its efficiency, using your social networks and the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
"VisiTalks" is the world's first set of Software + Hardware which are combined in a unique way to allow RealTime video communication for deaf people


Communicating between deaf and hearing people can be difficult. Usually it is necessary to use the communication support via sign language translation services.

And still in 21st century, there are no easy ways to connect deaf and hearing people, that's why the barrier between deaf and hearing people grows. This pushes deaf people to detach from hearing world, consolidate their own communities and live their own life... which makes the barrier even bigger. 

That's why we decided to build something that could connect deaf and hearing people and could be easily used by both. This is when the idea of VisiTalks was born.


What is VisiTalks?

"VisiTalks" is the world's first set of Software + Hardware which are combined in a unique way to allow RealTime video communication.

Before starting a video call via VisiTalks, a deaf user should connect specially designed gloves with sensors to his/her computer and calibrate this device using VisiTalks calibration module. After calibration, VisiTalks Software and Gloves are ready for conversation.

During the dialog with the help of VisiTalks Gloves a deaf person can communicate using sign language with a person who doesn't know sign language VisiTalks software converts sign language gestures, captured with gloves, into the ordinary speech.


VisiTalks Adjustment settings allow a deaf user to choose voice options such as: male or female voice with American/British/Australian accent, etc...  which allow a deaf user to control how his/her sign language will be converted in to speech.

(For example: A deaf woman from America can choose an American Female voice, in order for his/her partner to hear American female voice). Also, VisiTalks Adjustment settings will allow a deaf user to choose his/her sign language, for example: American Sign Language, British Sign Language, etc... In order to get messages from his/her partner in selected sign language which are displayed on user's screen as a set of animated gestures with subtitles.

A hearing user needs only microphone and headphones in order to communicate via VisiTalks.

ADVANTAGES OF VISITALKS

No analogue!

Before starting the project we asked the research department of Cardiff Metropolitan University to conduct a research in order to identify if there is a similar idea on the world's market. The research team has discovered, that there is no similar project in the world. It means, that our project will become very popular with an appropriate support.

Cooperation with governmental institutions

Many of us know, that sometimes governmental institutions are giving us a hard time issuing references or doing other important paper work. Just imagine how difficult it is for a deaf person to work with them! Our software will simplify the process of communication between the worker of governmental institution and a deaf person without using the services of a translator.

Equality

We believe, that our app will delete all the social barriers between those, who can hear and those, who can’t.

Free to use

We are going to make our application absolutely free, so that everybody could download it from our website.

TheVisiTalks Hardware

VisiTalks Hardware device is designed to allow the most accurate movement capturing.


The device consists of glove and elbow bandage, each glove contains 17 sensors + 1sensor in elbow bandage.

Such positioning gives ability to capture any hand, finger and palm movements.



FEATURES

·  RealTime Communication

Face to face communication between deaf and people who do not know sign language.

·  Motion Tracking

Contemporary Motion Tracking Sensors provide the most accurate movement detection.

·  Calibration

Easy and user friendly of gloves, which increases accuracy in motion capturing.

·  Supported

Visitalks is supported by Schools, Organizations and Universities for deaf.

·  Free

Visitalks is a non - commercial project aimed to help deaf people and it is free!

·  Easy

Visitalks is easy to use with a nice, user friendly interface. It can be used by kids, teens and old people.

WHAT ARE THE GOALS & WHAT YOU GET

We are students and obviously without your donations we cannot make VisiTalks.

With your help we together bring the possibility of free communication to deaf!

We need at least 100 000 in order to finish our development of sensored gloves and software.

-  VisiTalks platform;

-  VisiTalks device;

-  Development of sign languages libraries;

-  Testing and Calibration;

-  Debugging;

Your donations give us the possibility to develop the gloves for reasonable price that will be affordable for many thousands of deaf people. Every donated cent will be used for developing and for perfecting of the VisiTalks.

In return you will get the range of presents that will remind you about your participation in this social and technology project for all deaf people in the world!



RISKS & CHALLENGES

We hope that our VisiTalks will be downloaded by many people and organizations in order to gift a free communication. We will work hard on VisiTalks but we realize that the project is challenging and difficult, however, we will definitely make it happen.

FAQ's

You are student, do you have time to fulfill this project?

Yes, we are the 3rd year students on Business IT and Management specialties. Education and project take a lot of time and affords, however, we are happy to be busy!

Will be VisiTalks free?

Yes, VisiTalks will be absolutely free to download for any person or organization.

Where will the money go?
Money goes into further development of VisiTalks (sensors, web presence, software, other operating costs). We are not seeking for money – we want to make the thing which will be in use for many deaf people. And we proud of being part of social oriented life!

Other than contributing, how can I help?

Yes, you can help by sharing the information about VisiTalks in order to let know about it for more people that means more people who want to be part of assistants for deaf!

When can I expect to get my perk?

We promise that everyone will get the perk!  We and our student mates will put all our affords to send the perks quickly!

Can I get multiple perks?
Yes! You can back our campaign as many times as you want, choosing as many perks as you want.

Who can I contact with questions?  

You can send an email any time to mr.igor.dudnyk@gmail.com or via contact form on our website http://visitalks.com/contact.php  and we will contact you as soon as possible. 

TEAM

Vlad Dudnyk - 3rd year IBM International University College

Igor Dudnyk - 3rd year BIS International University College

story:
What We're About

Gaming has long been defined by male game designers and male characters. We're here to change that. We are working to revolutionize the gaming industry one game at a time. And, we need your help to get it started. 

Regicide: Tale of the Forgotten Thief is a game about a girl who wakes up in a dungeon with no memory of who she was. The only thing she knows is that the information on her cell claims she has stolen a loaf of bread. But, as you will discover, her story is so much more than that.

My name is Lucia Hill-Rains, and I've always dreamed about being a game designer. But, I want to be so much more than that. I want to make games that are fun, games that are innovative, and games make an impact on the world.

Regicide: Tale of the Forgotten Thief is an RPG - one that is a love letter to the classic games played on the original Nintendo and Super Nintendo. Hidden inside its labyrinth of levels, there are items to collect, puzzles to solve, conspiracies to uncover, and enemies to defeat.

The game will be available only on Windows initially.  Please see our stretch goals to see other platforms on which we plan to release the game.

Where the $1,200 Goes

We're asking for the small sum of $1,200.  This will enhance the experience of those playing Regicide: Tale of the Forgotten Thief and pay for the launch of our gaming revolution by funding:
  • Additional graphics 
  • Original Music
  • A platform to get our message out
  • Equipment upgrades and additional server costs

What's In it For Me?

You'll be one of the first to play Regicide. When you donate more than $10, you'll get an early access key to witness the continuing evolution and development of this soon-to-be-classic. 

We're also offering you a strategy guide, exclusive story content, and, even, hotel accommodations for the fabulous Regicide launch event!

Regicide: The Tale

At it's core, Regicide, is a story. It is a story that has woken me up in the middle of the night, interrupted me at work, and whispered to me in my dreams. It's a love story between me and a world that started over two years ago. The engine is now complete. It is finally time for the game itself to be created and shared with the world.

Regicide: Tale of the Forgotten Thief explores a multitude of themes, both current and timeless. When playing Regicide, gamers will encounter and explore themes such as amnesia, family conflict, privilege, ethics, a police state, etc. 

Gaming is my passion. And, I've been an innovator in the industry before: I worked on a game called "Dungeon Overlord" which brought German-style tabletop gaming to Facebook.

Risks & Challenges

Most of the related risks have already been worked through.  The engine is complete; and, I've gotten rid of a lot of features to avoid scope creep so that there are no extraneous lines of code.

However, there are always risks.  The biggest risk is not completing this project by a certain date.  Accountability to my followers and my executive producers will help with this.  Also, I've been on extremely time-sensitive projects - we know when and how to put our heads down and work.

Other Ways You Can Help

Let's say money is short, but you still want to help.  Spread the word. Talk up this project. Tell your friends about Regicide: Tale of the Forgotten Thief.  Follow us on Facebook and Twitter. Tell people how excited you are about this project and how you much you want to play it!

Stretch Goals

We have made new stretch goals!  
If we reach $1,500, we will release a Linux version.
If we reach $1,800, we will release an OSX version.
If we reach $2,200 we will release a version for mobile devices.

Play Our Demo

When you sign up for our mailing list, you can get access to the same engine test seen in our pitch video!  You'll also receive exclusive content and be the first to know about future updates and releases.
