story:
The Die is Cast is a political drama about the compromises and machinations that go on behind closed doors in the capitol.  The story follows Peter Warren, a young congressman, who (with the help of his loyal and ruthless Chief of Staff Nathan Fowler) wants to climb the political ladder to attain the kind of power and influence he’s always coveted.  The film explores the main character’s moral depravity, while also examining the environment he thrives in.  The audience will also get to see glimpses of Warren’s humanity as he takes another younger colleague under his wing.  Warren’s plans for political ascension become more precarious as complications and difficult choices are placed in the way of what he wants.

If our creators, Yoko and Michael, had come up with The Die is Cast over a year ago, it might not have made it past the pitch meeting due to it’s ambition and lack of feasibility.  However, as our work has improved and we have improved we feel we finally have the capability to make a project like this into a reality, but we can’t do it alone.  In order to tell the story we want to tell, we require a wide variety of locations, a sizable cast and crew and newer, more advanced equipment.  We want to do this story justice and adapt it to best of our ability and for that we need a working budget.  That, hopefully, is where you guys come in. Our budgetary total may seem daunting, but any amount of money that you can contribute will bring us one step closer to realizing our dream.

We need to raise money to transport our actors and crew for several day long shoots in DC. We also need to pay for film permits, which can carry hefty fees, given the public areas we’d like to use. Many of our actors and crewmembers are taking time off work and spending less time on other projects and to show our appreciation we would like to provide them with basic pay, catering and hotel rooms for shoots in DC that require overnight stays, not to mention wardrobe and makeup cost for these same actors.

We also want to purchase more equipment such as lavalier clip on mics to ensure higher sound quality, a new set of lights, gels, defusers and reflectors to efficiently set up lighting in ways that compliments the themes and moods in our scenes and, if we can get the money for it, attachments for our main camera, like dollys, rigs to ensure steady and seamless tracking and handheld shots. As we outlined our budget with our producers and production managers several unexpected potential expenses presented themselves and we would like a little extra insurance money if possible so that, if any more unpleasant monetary surprises appear in our way, they won’t slow us down.

We realize that we’re asking for a lot but we think it is worth it giving the difference this budget will make in terms of quality. We believe in this project so much that many of the people involved have invested their own money into the project. We hope that you will see the same potential that we do in this project and hope that you might be willing to part with some of your hard-earned cash to support it.

story:
What a world, what a time, what a dame...

Welcome to the Newsraven community. 

THE LOWDOWN

TV Series. Neo-Noir Pilot Episode 

Los Angeles, 1934. Inspired by creative, gutsy, female journalists of yesteryear such as Dorothy Dix, and Agness Underwood, 'Newsraven' introduces sultry, tenacious, intrepid, crime reporter Audrey Corbeau. Torn between career and family, in a time when her choice was considered outrageous, Audrey delves behind the glamorous facade of Hollywood's glitz, solving some of the city's goriest crimes with instinct and moxie. Determined, she unravels felonies by gut instinct with the support of her fabulous network of female informers and cross-cultural pals spread out across the hotbed of crime that was LA in the 1930s. Everyone's trying to hide something in this game, even our gal Audrey.

THE FACTS

The script has been drafted, so the focus of this campaign is production of the TV pilot and bringing Audrey to the screen, with the ultimate aim of using the success of the pilot to secure a series deal about this fabulous, galvanizing, wise-cracking crime reporter. Please join the Newsraven community and be part of this exciting 21century production of a feisty dame driven neo-noir TV pilot. 

Belief in the project has secured a partnership with the dynamic non-profit organisation From The Heart, which guarantees that your donation is TAX DEDUCTIBLE. The opportunity to produce Newsraven has been developed through the David Lynch MA in Film. With that kind of backing, I'm out to catch a big fish as David Lynch would say, and bring this gutsy and highly entertaining dame, created and to be produced by women, to the screen for all to enjoy.  And we're proud to say that Newsraven passes the Bechdel, Maki Mori and the Russo tests. How could you not join in the fun?

Shoot dates are between March 31 to April 17.

THE PILOT PLOT

The storyline for the pilot episode, Newsraven -'White Devil' is a riveting noir ride into 1930s Los Angeles. I was given some fantastic help through the David Lynch MA in Film to develop it, and now the script is ready to shoot. It's a real 'whodunnit', and we have some talented actors ready to play and crew ready to shoot. All we need is your help to make it happen! 

On this steamy summer's day in 1934, Hollywood's darling, Thelma Todd is opening her Pacific Palisades Café. Meanwhile downtown a young girl, who was brutally attacked at Jerry's Joynt in Chinatown overnight, is admitted to hospital.

Who's the perp'? Is it one of Chinatown's community whom they're protecting? Is it an unknown felon terrorising Chinatown, unhindered by the disinterested LA Cops? Or is it sleaze bag, exploitation flick Producer Anton Goldfinch, under the squeeze from the Hayes Office Production Code? 

Audrey's aided, and stymied in equal measure at every turn by the handsome, enigmatic Barry Fulton, press photographer for the competitor newspaper, and by Chinatown's heavy hitter, the debonaire and mysterious Peter Yue.

She'll need to dig deep,and work fast, racing against time to solve the mystery and write up the story before the ill-will brewing erupts into a race riot.


How passionate am I about this project? I  bought this beautiful, 1926, No.5 Underwood  because my inspiration, Aggie Underwood had the exact same one!


SHOWRUNNER

As a filmmaker I forged my professional career in both Australia and the USA, and am now combining my myriad of experiences as producer, writer and director to be showrunner on this entertaining and enthralling TV pilot. 

CREW - Watch this list grow during the Indiegogo campaign!

Karen Borger | Director, Writer, Showrunner
Velinda Wardell | Director of Photography

Melissa Chaconas | Camera Assistant
Chandler Baucom | Camera Assistant

Mary Veronica Sweeney | Scenic Art
Laura Bustillos Jaquez | Scenic Art
Rudoflo Rincones |Scenic Art

Michelle Kelling |Make Up (Fairfield)

Simone Cozens|Hair & Make Up (Los Angeles)

Max Sharam |  Title Track, 'Coma'
Skunk River Medicine Show |  Music Tracks

CAST - Exciting announcements coming soon after the script 'table read' being help in Los Angeles on Tuesday, February 17, 2015!


                                

            Aggie Underwood interviewing a victim, or is this gal really the perp' !

MULLA - FOR WHAT?

The David Lynch MA in Film program is supplying goods-in-kind support in the shape of RED camera gear and sound equipment, plus a studio to shoot in. The 1930s-looking town of Fairfield is being generous with locations. Many incredibly talented actors are keen to play roles, and eager crew ready to work on the project, but we need to cover shoot expenses, look after cast & crew, create viable 1930s sets and shoot a few days in LA for exteriors.

Thus, your generous gift of a tax deductible donation will fund a myriad of production expenses for the shooting of the TV pilot: 

  • Travel, accommodation, fees for our actors and crew. 
  • Costumes, make-up & art department rentals and hires
  • On set catering and safety provisions
  • Additional camera, grip and electrical gear
  • Insurance, location and production expenses to ensure we run a safe and productive set.  
I can just make it work for $30,000 which will cover a frugal production budget. But if we garner a higher sum through your belief in the project and support for our agenda of fostering greater equality in the industry, additional donations will be put to great use, ensuring better fees for actors and crew. 

We'll be running a second campaign for post -production at a later stage.

                                     

REWARDS 

Donors will be the first to be able to download the pilot and watch it! Based on your level of contribution you'll be rewarded with other cool opportunities - such as being invited to 'set' if you live locally to meet the stars, and also chances to enjoy some first edition retro 'prop' perks or a signed script - available only through this Newsraven Indiegogo campaign. 

So please check out the perks! Decide which one is a good fit for your donation and join the Newsraven community via your tax deductible donation. You'll be warmly welcomed in the fold, and given first hand news as the project travels through pre-pro, the shoot, and post-production.

THE BACKSTORY

I fell in love with classic Hollywood 'mythology' when I was very young, and have always been a fan of noir. Newsraven allows me to recreate that world and redress the gender status quo to my liking. The project's seeds were planted when I moved to Los Angeles and began working for the 'Mouse'. On weekends I visited iconic locations and during lunchtimes I trawled old book stores near the studio, listening to fascinating stories about vintage Hollywood crimes, and the gutsy, wise-cracking female crime reporters of the 1930s and 1940s who happily covered the tough turf, purportedly a 'man's world'. 

So inspired, I devised a memorable female character, of the era, for the screen - Audrey Corbeau, and flipped a few tropes . This is about a woman journalist with moxie, cracking tough crime cases, aided and abetted by her unique posse. Audrey's network are the people the white men of noir generally ignore or despise. In Newsraven they are Audrey's strength and trusted sources. In Newsraven, men become the 'homme fatale', and Audrey's best weapon is her feminine instinct, symbolised by a raven. When I created Audrey I held this quote in my mind , 'Why try to fit in, when you were born to stand out'?

THE MOXIE

Behind the scenes we're stirring things up too, because quite frankly I'm sick of just complaining about the dearth of women in front of and behind the cameras. 

You know the shtick - per the DGA’s research, for the 2012-13 season, women directors accounted for just 14% of primetime episodic TV across broadcast and cable outlets. In a study run by the Geena Davis Institute on Gender in Media, discovered that the ratio of men to women on the screen was 5.4 to 1 on TV, with the percentages of speaking female characters: only 28.3 percent in prime time. Don't even get me started on the crew role inequalities.

But enough whining and waiting around for when we're told we can play. It's time to 'be part of the change we want to see in the world'. 

And fellas - this is not about exclusion. I'm all about creating a level playing field for women and men to work together with gender equality and diversity respected across the board. 

So please join the community to help me bring Audrey to the screen, be entertained while making change happen - after all it's tax deductible!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Without your support and generosity Newsraven as a fully fledged pilot won't happen. Instead I'll be making a proof of concept video and shlepping that around Hollywood, and we know how that goes…It's a fact of life that it's not easy to break into the system. 

It's also a fact that it's even harder if you're a woman or from a minority. Despite drama experience, without prior TV involvement or a pilot under your belt if you fit in this classification by today's standard you have little to no chance, whether you're a writer, director, producer, actor, cinematographer, sound recordist, make-up artist, hair stylist, costume designer, production designer, art director, sound mixer, composer or any other crew/post production member of the team to be employed. 

So I am personally trying to make a change to the status quo, and aim take a team of women with me by giving them a first chance at TV on this project too. 

You can join the community of active contributors to that will make this happen through your tax deductible donation. 

And on a personal note, after 2 years out of the industry due to a spinal injury and too much time sitting around in hospitals, I'm re-entering the game in a way that works with my limitations. I may not be able to sling a camera and tripod over my shoulder and climb a mountain any more, but I sure can showrun. There's absolutely nothing wrong with my smarts, my talent and my will power (just a sore back!). All I need is for you to take a chance, back Newsraven and I'll make it happen.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

And please know that if you are unable to assist with fiscal donations, there are other ways you can assist the production.  Every little bit of effort counts! You will be credited for your help.

  • Please share the Indiegogo page, and push it out during the campaign run. 
  • Please use the share tools on the page to make this happen.
  • Goods-in-kind donations in Fairfield, IA and Los Angeles, CA are most welcome. Contact the team via the website contact page 
  • Do you know someone who needs a tax deduction - please share the link!
  • Do you know someone who cares about gender disparity and racial diversity in the screen industry? - please share with them too!
  • Do you have frequent flyer points you are willing to donate? We need points both internationally, and also cross-continent in the USA for our cast and crew. Please let the team know via the website contact page and we'll work out perks to reward your generosity!

Thank you for taking time to visit the page, read the blurb and for supporting Newsraven! 

Please accept my  sincere gratitude for the support you have already show in reading the campaign page for Newsraven, for donating what you can and for sharing the link.  Please talk about it too - word of mouth is a wonderful thing!

You are the one who can make it happen.

story:
The Plot

Wandering out into the woods a husband searches for a specific spot at a Shallow Creek. This is the place where he proposed to his late wife. He is tasked by her to spread her ashes there. Her supernatural presence is there with him watching to see if he will go through with it. Flashbacks before she dies reveals why this will be a struggle for the husband.

Production Breakdown

Photo by Gregory Brown from work on a feature length film

Shallow Creek will be filmed in Austin, TX. The story is purposefully written so it can be filmed with the lowest production costs but still retain high production quality.

How It Will Be Fiscally Cost Effective:

  • Two Locations
  • Two Actors
  • One Shooting Day
  • Small Crew
  • Will be shoot with Director's personal camera (Panasonic GH4) + accessories

The Funds Raised Will Go Towards:


Meet The Production Team

Gregory Brown: Director/Writer

Gregory Brown was born Austin, TX. After graduating high school Gregory went to college at the University of Colorado at Boulder. After graduating with a Bachelor of Arts in Film Studies Gregory moved back to his hometown to begin his career in the film industry.

Starting out as a Production Assistant working on movies and television Gregory has transitioned into working as Camera Assistant, Assistant Director, and Camera Operator for a variety of projects. In the fall of 2014 Gregory worked as Director of Photography for four short films. 

Shallow Creek will be Gregory Brown's directorial debut.

Gregory Brown's Reels:

Here is a rough cut of a short film Gregory Brown worked on as Director of Photography. Watch It Here. Password: Loving_Olivia

Working as Camera Operator:

Jack McConnell: Producer

Jack McConnell was born in Austin, TX. He began acting after graduating high school early. While working on 'Say No To Temptations' he was asked to take on the role of producer and co-director. After finishing the project and meeting with a senior producer from America's Got Talent he decided to pursue a career in film production as well as acting. Since then he has taken on multiple projects as a producer. Most of Jack's recent projects can be found on his IMDb page: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm6907381/


Meet The Cast

Sarah Byington as the wife

Sarah is singer, actress, model, and most importantly, a native Austinite. Sarah studied acting in New York where she graduated from AMDA­ American Musical & Dramatic Academy.  She also is very proficient behind the camera as well, excelling as a producer, production coordinator, directing, wardrobe, and yes, even crafty. Sarah's passion for acting stems from a strong desire to simply share people';s stories: the happy tales, and even the harsh ones.

Oryan Landa as the husband

Oryan Landa is a working actor based out of Austin, TX who works regularly in films, commercials, and music videos - with roles in over 40 independent films. He has recently worked with actors Jesse Borrego, Ethan Embry, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Patrick Muldoon, and Dominique Swain on films due for release in 2015. He has also done stunt work on the TV series From Dusk Till Dawn (from director Robert Rodriguez) and is now working on season two of the series. He is thrilled to be part of Shallow Creek, and looks forward to taking on the role of the husband.


Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenge is to make a professional great looking and acted film through a limited budget. Already budgeted in advance the production believes that it can achieve this. However, the less money raised means that the job is harder to achieve.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute there are many other ways of helping the production:

    • Share the campaign page with family, friends, and co-workers
    • Share on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Emails, etc.)
    • Like our Facebook Page
    Thank you for reading everything and your consideration in helping to support independent film making.

 Thank you for reading everything and your consideration in helping to support independent film making.

story:
Short Summary

Hi! I'm Marianne Gorsky. I'm a Senior Television Production & Media Management Major at Drexel University, and I'm currently working on pulling my senior thesis film together.

  • I've been working in film and television since middle school, and it's been my goal to see a project that I can declare as fully MINE from start to finish.
  • The story I've decided to tell is fun, quirky, and not your run-of-the-mill senior project. Instead of dramatic, tense, crying scenes, I've got puppets yelling & cursing at each other!
  • I'm looking for contributions to not only feed my crew and pay for locations, but to up the production value as a whole. I have puppet makers working very hard to make this film happen, but they don't come free!

My goal is simply to make people smile, and to have fun while doing it. However, I can't do that if I can't pay for the props needed.

What We Need & What You Get

Does that sound like a lot of money for a silly little puppet film? Well, here's exactly what I'm looking for & why:

  • I'm asking for $3000 (or more, if you love me) because the puppets themselves were $1000. On top of that there are location fees of $1200 that I'm facing, and of course, a hungry cast and crew to feed!
  • We're going ALL over to shoot this -- you'll see puppets in places you'd never think of! (They might even get put in the slammer! *Hint Hint*)
  • Even if the goal of $3000 isn't reached, your donations will go towards the purchases that have already been made for this film, and to feeding my amazing and always hungry crew of wonderful people. They really are great.

The Impact

  • The goal is to HAVE FUN throughout the entire process! (And if the stress of money is taken away...whew, that would be a whole lot easier.)
  • I've worked on many, many productions before, but I want to be able to take a crew through my own work from start to finish and show everyone a product I am proud of -- not something thrown together out of desperation.
  • This is the last thing I'll be doing at Drexel. I want to walk out with a smile, knowing I did my best to create a piece with major production value, knowing I didn't skimp on anything I didn't have to, that I put everything I had into this. I know that will happen if we have the funds to make this world I've created on the page feel as real on the screen.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • We're already partly on our way through pre-production, but we're not there yet! We film March 6th through the 8th, and we need all the help we can get before then.
  • Tell your friends! Tell your Mom! Tell your old teachers! Tell your dog! Tell strangers in the supermarket (oh jeez, who says supermarket? I meant grocery store)! Tell everyone you know and everyone you meet to check us out and donate.
  • If you can't donate at this time, or your friends can't, you guys should still share our page! Hey, it's got my doodly sticky notes on it, what more could you want?

Thanks for sticking with me through this!
story_txt:
Short Summary Hi! I'm Marianne Gorsky. I'm a Senior Television Production & Media Management Major at Drexel University, and I'm currently working on pulling my senior thesis film together.  I've been working in film and television since middle school, and it's been my goal to see a project that I can declare as fully MINE from start to finish. The story I've decided to tell is fun, quirky, and not your run-of-the-mill senior project. Instead of dramatic, tense, crying scenes, I've got puppets yelling & cursing at each other! I'm looking for contributions to not only feed my crew and pay for locations, but to up the production value as a whole. I have puppet makers working very hard to make this film happen, but they don't come free!  My goal is simply to make people smile, and to have fun while doing it. However, I can't do that if I can't pay for the props needed.   What We Need & What You Get Does that sound like a lot of money for a silly little puppet film? Well, here's exactly what I'm looking for & why:  I'm asking for $3000 (or more, if you love me) because the puppets themselves were $1000. On top of that there are location fees of $1200 that I'm facing, and of course, a hungry cast and crew to feed! We're going ALL over to shoot this -- you'll see puppets in places you'd never think of! (They might even get put in the slammer! *Hint Hint*) Even if the goal of $3000 isn't reached, your donations will go towards the purchases that have already been made for this film, and to feeding my amazing and always hungry crew of wonderful people. They really are great.    The Impact 
The goal is to HAVE FUN throughout the entire process! (And if the stress of money is taken away...whew, that would be a whole lot easier.)
 I've worked on many, many productions before, but I want to be able to take a crew through my own work from start to finish and show everyone a product I am proud of -- not something thrown together out of desperation. This is the last thing I'll be doing at Drexel. I want to walk out with a smile, knowing I did my best to create a piece with major production value, knowing I didn't skimp on anything I didn't have to, that I put everything I had into this. I know that will happen if we have the funds to make this world I've created on the page feel as real on the screen.



    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  We're already partly on our way through pre-production, but we're not there yet! We film March 6th through the 8th, and we need all the help we can get before then.
Tell your friends! Tell your Mom! Tell your old teachers! Tell your dog! Tell strangers in the supermarket (oh jeez, who says supermarket? I meant grocery store)! Tell everyone you know and everyone you meet to check us out and donate. If you can't donate at this time, or your friends can't, you guys should still share our page! Hey, it's got my doodly sticky notes on it, what more could you want?   Thanks for sticking with me through this!

story:
Update 21st September 2015:

Download ProTip Now

Fork The Source Code on GitHub


Update 1st May 2015: We succeeded in raising:

$12,183

Ignore the Indiegogo total it doesn't include our Bitcoin donations. 

We beat our first milestone target of $10,000 by more than 20%. We are very grateful to all of you who believed in us and showed your support.

The Beta of ProTip has now been sent out to the sponsors Priority Access Supporters 1 day ahead of scheduled release making us one of the first Bitcoin Crowd Funds to launch early.

For more updates follow us on Twitter: @ProTipHQ

For more anonymous payments we accept Bitcoin:

1ProTip9x3uoqKDJeMQJdQUCQawDLauNiF

A web browser plugin for:

  1. Tipping & online donations for doing the work you love
  2. Weekly subscriptions for your loyal audience
  3. Content passes for your most premium work

Platform independent will work with your: YouTube, Soundcloud, WordPress/Blogger, Tumblr, Twitter, Deviant Art, Flickr, Patreon and self hosted websites and many more.

1. Tipping & Online Donations, just put your bitcoin address onto your website. When a ProTip user visits your website, it detects your bitcoin address and tips you at the end of the week! The tip is based on the time they spend enjoying your work. That seems fair!

2. Subscription, your repeat visitors can easily click the ❤ to become a weekly subscriber. It is a small amount, but it is consistent. 

Stretch Goal: Send direct messages to your loyal subscribers.

3. Stretch Goal: Content Pass, a lightweight bitcoin payment system for your most loyal audience. Charge as little as $0.14 for individual songs, comic strips, podcasts, videos or articles. 

The ProTip users have the convenience of one click payment. However, non-ProTip users can still use your content pass using any of the existing bitcoin wallets. There is no lock-in to the ProTip plugin. 

TL;DR

ProTip is peer to peer crowd funding. We’re big fans of Patreon and Flattr, but we feel the commissions are too high and you are locked in to the platform. 

Why Bitcoin?

Only distributed digital currencies, like Bitcoin, allow you to use small payments in your business model. 

Very small payments are not viable when using credit cards & PayPal. The transfer fees and the risk of fraud, make traditional methods impractical. 

To get started with Bitcoin checkout these easy Bitcoin Wallets:

https://blockchain.info/wallet/new

https://bitcoin.org/en/choose-your-wallet

Pledge in Bitcoin

To Pledge using Bitcoin simply leave us a private message on Indiegogo including the following information us before you make the transaction:

  • Your email
  • Your Bitcoin address you will be sending from

Then wait 10 minutes before making the payment to the following address:

1ProTip9x3uoqKDJeMQJdQUCQawDLauNiF

Who Are We?

Leo Campbell - Chief Engineering Officer

Leo’s father was a cofounder of the australian web design agency Paradigm4, registered 1997. Leo had a front row seat to witness the mainstream adoption of the web.

Intrigued by the revolution in genetics and bioinformatics, Leo’s academic studies included pharmacology, clinical trial design and international drug regulation.

Leo’s professional career is diverse. Working in Japan as a biotech patent analyst, his programming skills were honed as a medical marketer and product designer.

Moving to London in 2011, Leo has worked for a range of startups. Leo attended the hackathon “Make the Bank”, Oct 2014 and the British Medical Journal Hack Day, July 2013; there winning an honorable mention.
http://hacks.rewiredstate.org/events/bmj/pagerank-for-biomedical-literature

Chris Ellis - Chief Education Officer

Chris is on a mission to help people be rewarded for all their hard work. 18 months ago he started a YouTube channel with some friends from across the globe. It is dedicated to technology and charts the rise of the emerging digital economy.

However Chris and the team grew increasingly frustrated as they noticed that many aspiring journalists were taking to PR and Marketing roles instead of speaking the truth.

With a passion for education in his past role as lecturer as University of the Arts, London, Chris spends much of his time helping people understand the tools they need to help them make better decisions and reach their goals.

What We Need & What You Get

$10,000 - 3 Months Development

Your money buys us time and focus. If we reach $10,000 then we will open source the code on 1st May 2015.

We already have a working demo and with a bit more time we will be able to release a fully functional beta version.

The beta will contain:

  • An Open Source Browser Plugin - follows the time spent on websites and tips automatically

  • Privacy by Default - all data is stored locally in the browser, ProTip does not collect your data without your permission.

  • Easy To Use Interface - with automatic tipping.

  • Subscription Feature - allows users to set a weekly allowance and reward content creators automatically.

$10,000 is only our first goal. If you really want this software, we can do so much more...

$25,000 - 6 Months Development

With this kind of money we can really give ProTip the kind of care and attention that it needs.

  • Advanced Subscription Features - we would like to explore business models for artists to further develop the app. We will listen to ideas from the people themselves and we can work together improving ways to help you get paid.

  • Community Outreach - let's create a movement where people are rewarded for their work online.

  • Software Automated Testing Suite - for developers and documentation.

$50,000+ - Full Time Jobs - Killer Features

Now we're cooking with gas! This is our vision:

  • Firefox Extension - we hear you! We are privacy conscious, open source advocates.

  • Secure Feedback System - we want to help artists and audiences to communicate directly. No email addresses or social media sign-in needed. Goodbye spam and unwanted newsletters!

  • Content Pass - this idea would allow content creators to charge more for special content. This would allow creators to charge more for their most loyal audience.

  • Subscriptions - for media such as podcasts, live streaming and API based services.

Following our first beta in May if we raise our intended goal we pledge to spend another 6-9 months fixing bugs, developing new features, responding to user feedback and translating the user interface.

Our goal is to have the first release ready by December 2015.

What If We Don’t Get the Funding?

Our pledge is to be long term contributors and stewards of this project, after all it’s our baby and we will try to deliver as much as we can. But it will take more time if we have to get jobs to pay the bills and put food on the table.

We will be using an iterative, open development process which means you won't have to wait long to see results.

The project is also Open Source meaning the code will be freely available in case someone more capable comes along.

FAQ

Can I Pay In Bitcoin?

Anonymous donors can pledge to the following address: 1ProTip9x3uoqKDJeMQJdQUCQawDLauNiF

How does ProTip measure the time I spend on each page?

ProTip can recognise if the mouse is active and which tab you are currently focused on. Once a minute it re-calculates the elapsed time.

How does ProTip find the bitcoin addresses on the page?

ProTip looks for bitcoin addresses in three places in order of priority:

1. In the header of the HTML:
<meta name="microtip" content="13U4gmroMmFwxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" data-currency='btc' data-recipient="John Doe">

2. In bitcoin payment hyperlinks:
<a href="bitcoin:13U4gmroMmFwxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx">Please Donate!</a>

3. Scanning the plain text of the webpage:

Is my personal data safe?

The browsing history is cleared immediately after your weekly donation. Simply not retaining data is a good privacy measure, which we think deserves to be a default setting.

You can clear the browsing history anytime. When you run your browser in privacy mode the app is de-activated.

Are my Bitcoins securely stored?

At the default security level the private keys are stored on your own computer, in a datastore that only ProTip can access. We believe that this is a good compromise of security and usability, given the wallet is never intended to hold large sums of money.

At the higher level of security, you can encrypt the private key with a password. This password is required for each transaction. Like any Bitcoin wallet if you forget this password, your bitcoins will be lost.

Can I backup my Bitcoins?

Yes, ProTip can provide an exportable backup for your public and private keys.

story:
Lake Effect is the story of a group of friends that go out into a storm to try to locate one member of the group's terminally ill father. Once they brave the elements they realize that there is more than just a storm to worry about. A creature with telekinetic abilities, that can freeze your insides with a simple touch has entered the city along with the storm to wreak havoc upon the community.

We've raised some of the funds already and will be getting our creature made by Immortal Masks, a company revolutionizing The Silicone Mask Industry with the highest quality masks ever created.

http://www.dreadcentral.com/news/92611/first-de...

Our IMDb page is up:
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4483530/?ref_=nm_fl...

THE CAST

Tia Maurice as Sarah

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm5461079/?ref_=ttfc_fc_cl_t1

Simeon Qualiana as Jay

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3957107/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1

Daniel James as Kyle

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4461055/?ref_=ttfc_fc_cl_t35

Erika Frase as Molly

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4507586/?ref_=fn_al_nm_1


What We Need

We need money for equipment, costumes, props, transportation, expenses and food. Most of our crew and talent are working for free! We'd like to pay everyone for their hard work but realistically might not be able to do that unless we go over our goal.

SNOW SHARK and THE LEGEND OF SIX FINGERS were mostly crowd funded films and both received worldwide distribution deals. We intend on seeking distribution for this film as well.

SAM QUALIANA wrote and Directed THE LEGEND OF SIX FINGERS which has received a distribution deal and is out on DVD and VOD. Qualiana won the Filmmaker to Watch Award at Buffalo Screams Horror Film Festival, and his short film SOMETHING AFTER MIDNIGHT won Best Horror Short Film. His debut feature, SNOW SHARK: ANCIENT SNOW BEAST, won “Best Title” at PollyGrind Film Festival and was released on DVD by Alternative Cinema/POP Cinema Studios. Sam worked as 2nd Assistant Director on Debbie Rochon’s MODEL HUNGER, 1st AD on Lloyd Kaufman’s RETURN TO NUKE EM HIGH, 2nd AD on Chris Olen Ray’s SyFy werewolf movie BATTLEDOGS, and Director of Photography on Gregory Lamberson and Michael O’Hear’s DRY BONES plus much more. http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2713500/?ref_=tt_ov_dr

Here's a quick teaser we threw together for the film.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FSPVE-PxCmU

story:
Laure Anne & Chris Wedding/Honeymoon in Vegas! 

Bonjour à tous et merci de visiter notre page crowdfunding pour nous aider à réaliser et à financer notre mariage et lune de miel à LAS VEGAS!

En effet, nous voulions au départ faire un mariage à St Barth ou nous habitons, puis un autre à Brux'hell, notre ville natale et ensuite un voyage de noce à Vegas avec un troisième et dernier mariage avec ELVIS himself...

Mais voilà, tout cela coûte beaucoup d'argent et nous avons donc choisi de nous marier avec ELVIS à LAS VEGAS!! :D

Tous le monde est invité pour ceux qui pourraient y participer sur place bien sûr! You are all WELCOME to LAS VEGAS! 

LA DATE EST FIXEE AU 9 MAI 2015!!! :)

Nous, eh bien nous ferons d'une pierre deux coups en organisant un wedding/honeymoon road trip en Californie.

Nous partirons 3 semaines aux USA pour notre mariage à Vegas et notre lune de miel roadtrip en Californie. Puis nous passerons par le plat pays pour une semaine dans la foulée, pour voir nos familles et amis au pays du froid et de la pluie, haha! (En espérant que fin Mai il y fasse beau!)

DATE DE BELGIQUE FIXEE! DU 26 MAI AU 4 JUIN! :)

Pour pouvoir faire ce beau voyage, il y a pas mal de billets d'avions à réserver et le montant de notre crowdfunding s'élève au montant de ces billets...

Donc pour ceux qui aimeraient nous aider ou pensaient à un cadeau de mariage, voici un bon moyen qui nous ravirait grandement ;)

ET bien entendu toute notre reconnaissance éternelle devant l'univers tout entier :p

LAURE ANNE & CHRIS

story:
Who we are

The Waterford Wolves are Waterford’s first homegrown American Football team. Created in November 2011, we began with 8 people playing non-contact football with only 2 footballs as our training equipment. 

Through the hard work and perseverance of club members we progressed into a solid functioning unit of 36 fully kitted players with a dedicated board, coaching staff, training grounds in Carraignore WIT Sports Campus and Homeground in the RSC.

Our mission
The Waterford Wolves have a dream, and it’s a big one! Our mission is to provide, live athletic entertainment that features adrenaline filled excitement; to promote the discipline and character of American Football in Ireland and to improve the community in Waterford as a whole. American football is currently one of the fastest growing sports in the Nation and The Waterford Wolves are at the forefront.

Waterford Wolves is a 100% player-owned and operated, non-profit organisation. This means all Waterford Wolves' equipment and events to-date, have been conceived, orchestrated, and run exclusively by its members and volunteers.

Why we're doing this 
We're creating this fundraising goal as playing American Football safely can be expensive. 
The Wolves get players from all different backgrounds and ages interested in playing with us, but unfortunately the club is very limited on the kit we can supply and sadly this means that some players cannot afford to join our pack.
We are aiming to make the game more affordable for players that show great talent and deserve to play but may struggle with the financial commitments that come with purchasing protective gear, registration and insurance. 
We would love to have the means to encourage more players and especially get young players involved in something productive in our community. The Wolves provide a network of security, comradery, discipline and pride for out team mates and we aim to cast the net as wide as we can reach. 
What you can do.
With your help you can help the Wolves widen our reach and involve all players from every background. A small donation will help us with our goal of purchasing the kit we need to provide our players with safe and reliable protection. 

We understand that not everyone is in a position to donate but we would still appreciate your help through spreading the word about our campaign. 
The Waterford Wolves would like to thank you for viewing our campaign and helping us reach our goals of kitting up our players. Thank you.

all Waterford Wolves' equipment and events to-date, have been conceived, orchestrated, and run
exclusively by its members and volunteers.
Why we're doing this We're creating this fundraising goal as playing American Football safely can be expensive. The Wolves get players from all different backgrounds and ages interested in playing with us, but unfortunately the club is very limited on the kit we can supply and sadly this means that some players cannot afford to join our pack.
We are aiming to make the game
more affordable for players that show great talent and deserve to play but may
struggle with the financial commitments that come with purchasing protective
gear, registration and insurance. 

We would love to have the means to encourage more players and especially get young players involved in something productive in our community. The Wolves provide a network of security, comradery, discipline and pride for out team mates and we aim to cast the net as wide as we can reach. 
What you can do.With your help you can help the Wolves widen our reach and involve all players from every background. A small donation will help us with our goal of purchasing the kit we need to provide our players with safe and reliable protection. We understand that not everyone is in a position to donate but we would still appreciate your help through spreading the word about our campaign. 
The Waterford Wolves would like to thank you for viewing our campaign and helping us reach our goals of kitting up our players. Thank you.

story:
Not able to contribute by credit card?

Feel free to use other options to show your support.


  • Paypal

    paypal@yetutlij.com

  • Check

    Positive Productions Inc.
    2714 Georgia Ave. NW
    Washington, DC 20001




what's your new film project?

YETUT LIJ /የጡት ልጅ/ is an Amharic phrase, that crudely translates to "Child of the Breast." It’s a term typically used to refer to any child taken in and raised by someone, other than their biological parent.

The title imitates the harsh and complex realities that I want to address in this film.

My story takes place in 1960’s Ethiopia, 20 years after the Italian occupation. Aynalem, a 13-year-old peasant girl, gets adopted by a wealthy judge's family and taken away from her own, with the promise of an educated upbringing and a better life. Contrary to this promise, she is instead forced to work as a domestic servant. Yet, despite the close watch and cruelty of her employers, she meets and falls in love with an ordinary police man, named Tilahun.Though, he manages to help her escape her circumstances, Tilahun finds Aynalem years later, in the clutches of another formidable captor.


why are you crowd-funding?

YETUT LIJ is a fictional drama with very real implications about human rights, specifically the right to love in the face of local and global forces. Though, the film is set in Ethiopia, Aynalem, for me, represents a vulnerable population of women and girls, who are trafficked exploited and enslaved all over the world.


The film’s script has been finished for more than 7 years, but unfortunately, the majority of that time has been spent trying to secure financing for the film.

I now have close to $500,000 secured in co-production funds, that will be lost if I am unable to raise the rest of the funds that I need to start shooting on-location in Ethiopia. In order to ensure this does not happen, I need a minimum of $500,000 in matching funds to help finance the YETUT LIJ production.


why do you need all that money?

Though $500,000 is no small favor to ask of you, it does make for a small budget.

Having directed and produced many of my past productions abroad, I can attest that filming on-location, especially in Africa, is expensive. But I know that with a minimum of $1 million, I can achieve the same level of production value that I have demonstrated with past films, like TEZA (2008), winner of the Golden Stallion Award at FESPACO and the special jury prize at the Venice Film Festival, among other recognition.

Award-winning films of this caliber would generally cost tens of millions of dollars, but I take pride in my ability to accomplish more with less.

Your matching contributions, will go directly toward the expenses of filming on-location (54%), namely, air travel, ground transportation & lodging. Though most of the actors will already be in Ethiopia, some of the cast and most of the crew will need to be flown in, as will most of our equipment (29%).

Cast & crew salary (17%) also includes training opportunities for 3-4 emerging filmmakers.


why should I support you?

By asking you to support the YETUT LIJ production, I am not just asking you to help me make my film, I am asking you to make a statement about the kind of films that you want to support, and the kind of films that you want to see.

For over 40 years, I’ve worked as an independent filmmaker, fighting tooth-and-nail to tell personal stories that I feel passionate about. YETUT LIJ is no different.

Under my companies Negod Gwad Productions and Mypheduh Films, Inc. respectively, I have produced and distributed, such critically-acclaimed and award-winning films as, TEZA, SANKOFA, ASHES & EMBERS, BUSH MAMA and the Cannes Classic, HARVEST 3000 YEARS.

I made these high-value, low-budget films by applying skills that I developed during my film school days at UCLA, where I worked alongside other independent filmmakers of color, like Charles Burnett, Billy Woodberry and Larry Clark.

The historical circumstances that we found ourselves in, at that time in 1960's America, forced us to be creative and innovative with our production techniques. To make films that we could claim as our own, stories that reflected our own cultural accents, we had to learn how to operate outside of the commercial and mainstream institutions.

Do your homework. Watch my past films, and those of my contemporaries. Then, decide for yourself, whether or not our work warrants your support. Just know that we cannot continue to create these films without you.


will my contribution make a difference?

Every contribution counts, no matter the amount. Since we’re raising campaign funds through Positive Productions, Inc., our verified non-profit, you can trust that every dollar that you contribute is tax-deductible. And any funds raised past our $500,000 goal will go directly toward the costs of post-production.

If you care about independent films, especially, those that portray people of color as complex characters with their own agency, then help me harness the same grassroots energy that made my critically-acclaimed film, SANKOFA a success.


will your film have an impact?

When SANKOFA premiered in 1993, it instigated a discussion, both in and outside of the black community, and affirmed, in my mind, the importance of independent films by and about the African Diaspora.

I witnessed theaters across America turn into night schools, as intense discourse was sparked among audience members, and as the black image was re-framed on-screen. After each screening, viewers, especially African and African-American viewers, would be so moved by the film that they would dig into their pockets and offer $5, $10, whatever they had, just to help keep the film in theaters and expand its distribution.

Galvanized by the reception of that film, my wife Shirikiana Aina, a fellow filmmaker, my sister Selome, and I established it’s namesake, Sankofa Video & Books Cafe, in Washington, D.C., right across from Howard University, where I have taught film since 1975.

Sankofa, the place, has become what I like to call “a liberated space:” a base of operations for Negod Gwad productions and a setting to engage critical discussion, not just around my films, but also around the work of other artists and intellectuals.

With the YETUT LIJ film campaign, I hope to inspire the same grassroots energy and engagement that made SANKOFA a success. I want to introduce my work to a new and wider audience online, while activating a loyal base of supporters that, I believe, has simply been waiting in the wings.


what do I get out of it?

Whatever you are able to contribute is appreciated. In exchange for your support, you can stake your claim on this production with one of the many perks shown to the right.

Here are a few highlights:

  • NAME THE NEXT FILMMAKER ON THE SANKOFA CAFE MENU!
  • RECEIVE A VIDEO MESSAGE OR CALL FROM FILMMAKER HAILE GERIMA!


    • 1-YEAR SCREENING SUBSCRIPTION OF A NEGOD GWAD FILM!


    • MASTER CLASSES IN FILM w/ HAILE GERIMA!


    what else can I do to help?

    1. FOLLOW @YETUTLIJMOVIE: On Twitter and Instagram. Use the hashtag #Childof to show your support.

    2. SHARE THIS LINK: Use → http://igg.me/at/hailegerima ← to be sure that all your contacts, followers and friends know where to go to contribute.

    3. SPREAD THE WORD: On the minute, on the hour, every day! Remember, after June 1st, WE ONLY HAVE 30 DAYS to reach our goal.

    4. VISIT SANKOFA: If you’re in the D.C. area, during the month of June, come to one of our local campaign events or stop by Sankofa Video & Books Cafe to see community arts and independent film in action.

story:
TOВА НЕ Е ПРОСТО ФИЛМ, А КАУЗА.
Борим се да съживим парченца българско наследство, застрашено от забвение. Ела в четата, помогни да направим филма по-як!

Румена е воевода на бунтовна чета в бруталния мъжки свят на 19 в. Принудена да напусне домашно огнище, тя открива бореца в себе си на сурова цена. Филм за отстояването, за воеводството и борбите на една майка.

ИСТИНСКА ИСТОРИЯ ПО РАЗКАЗ НА КЛАСИКА НИКОЛАЙ ХАЙТОВ.     СНИМКИ: ЕСЕН 2015. ПО ЕКРАНИТЕ: ЗИМА 2016/2017.      

IT IS NOT JUST A FILM. IT IS A CAUSE.

We strive to revive bits of Bulgarian heritage threatened with oblivion.
Join the gang, please help us make this film better!

Roumena is a leader (voevoda) of a rebelious gang in the brutal men's world of 19th century. Forced to leave home she discovers the fighter in herself but she has to pay the price. A film about standing up for one's choices and about chieftainship through the struggles of a mother.

BASED ON REAL CHARACTERS AND A SHORT STORY BY                        BULGARIAN CLASSIC WRITER NIKOLAY HAITOV.                                                     SHOOTING: FALL 2015. RELEASE: WINTER 2016/2017.

СКЪПИ ПРИЯТЕЛЮ,

вярваме, че не трябва да оставим уникални истории да потънат в забрава.

Знаеш  ли, че България има женски аналог на Робин Худ и Уилям Уолъс? Не една, а над 50 жени оставят хурка и грабват пушка в борба за справедливост и нито една не става редови хайдутин, а всички - воеводи на мъжки чети. Николай Хайтов, по чийто разказ е написан сценарият, нарича това феномен.

Подготвяме се 5 години за да направим автентичен хайдушки филм и в течение на работата открихме вселена, която искаме да съхраним и споделим. Заедно с теб!

Ако припознаваш каузите ни за свои и имаш кредитна карта или дебитна VISA карта или ползваш PayPal, можеш да избереш вдясно КАК да станем съратници. Сумите за различните нива не са цени за включените артикули, а степени на ДАРИТЕЛСТВО с цел до-финансиране на ВОЕВОДА. Тематичните дарове или спомени от филма са знак за нашата ПРИЗНАТЕЛНОСТ към всеки един от вас.

Има два начина да дарите:

- чрез кликване върху предпочетен от вас ДАР - може да ги намерите изброени в квадратчета в дясно.

- директно през бутона CONTRIBUTE NOW без да избирате ДАР - посочените там 5 USD, 10 USD или 100 USD са примерни и може да въведете друго, каквото ви е по сърце.

И при двете опции не е необходимо да имате регистрация в IndieGOGO, системата ще ви поиска емайл адрес или facebook, за да може да ви изпрати потвърждение-разписка. Плащането отнема около минута като дарението може да се направи анонимно или пък името ви да се почете в списъка FUNDERS тук. IndieGOGO ви предлага опция за публикуване на новината и линк към кампанията на стената ви във facebook при финализиране на плащането – избирайки я вие помагате каузата да достигне повече хора!

DEAR FRIEND,

We believe that we should not let exceptional stories fall in oblivion.

Did you know Bulgaria had female analogues of Robin Hood and William Wallace? Not one or two, but more than 50 women fought for justice and became not just regular rebels, but leaders of gangs - voevodas. A phenomenon few know about.

We've been developing this film for 5 years now to make it authentic as to reawaken the drama of Roumena Voevoda in a gritty realistic way. And in the course we've discovered an inspiring universe we want to share with the world. With your help!

If you feel for our cause and you have a credit card or a VISA Electron debit card or you are a PayPal user - you can choose a way to join it to the right. Please note that the prices at the different levels are not market prices but the DONATIONS you can make to contribute to making VOEVODA film better. We give these perks out as a sign of our GRATITUDE and in return of your help!

There are two ways to contribute:

- By clicking on a preferred PERK – you can find them all listed to the right.

- Directly by clicking on the CONTRIBUTE NOW button (without selecting a PERK) – the shown there 5 USD, 10USD or 100 USD are indicative and may enter another amount of your choosing.

You do not need to an IndieGOGO account to use any of these options. The payment takes about a minute and the system will ask for an email address or facebook login in order to send you a receipt. The donation can be made anonymously or your name will appear in the list of funders here. IndieGOGO gives you the option to share the news of your donation and a link to the campaign on your facebook timeline – by choosing it you will be helping the cause to reach even more people!


ТОЗИ ФИЛМ E

за отстояването.

Румена Воeвода е реална историческа личност. Преди век и половина, все едно е днес, тя се бори да помири мъжките с женските си качества, бунтовника - с майката и любимата, в конфликт с нормите на обществото и на собствените си другари. Как  се превръща шайката разбойници в робин-худовци? Ако отстояването на себе си ти коства най-скъпото, би ли платил цената?

THIS IS A FILM ABOUT...

standing up.

Roumena Voevoda is a real person from 19th century Bulgaria. 150 years ago, as if it is today, she strives to reconcile the warrior and the female nature within herself, the fighter - with the mother and the lover against the status quo and her own comrades. What  transforms the outlaw thugs into Robin-Hood-type of fighters? If standing up for your choices comes at a dear price, would you pay it?

ТОЗИ ФИЛМ НЕ...

...следва клишето ‘хайдути се борят с турци и мюсюлмани’. Интересува ни отношението чoвeк-човек. Не в един случай от историята свой - свой убива, а ръка се подава и от враг - с респект.

...ползва бутафорен реквизит, оръжия и стилизирани носии. С помощта на ентусиасти и колекционери на съкровища от Възраждането - съвременни хайдути - ние възстановяваме истински реликви и умения от време оно.

...е холивудски екшън със супер герои и огромни масовки. Нашите герои са земни и корави, а повечето ни актьори са или малко познати лица, или хора от живота, които ще видим за първи път на екран.

THIS FILM IS NOT ABOUT...

...the cliche rebels fight against the Ottomans only. We are interested in the human relationships. Not once in history the traitor was once a friend and an enemy becomes an ally - out of respect.

...artificial props, costumes and weapons. With the help of collectors who will take part in the film - we restore real treasures of national heritage.

...copying Hollywood action with super heroes and giant battle scenes. We feature down-to-earth characters and actors mostly unknown and fresh for the big screen.


НАШАТА ЧЕТА

също се предвожда от жена. Зорница София е режисьор на Воевода. Това е петият й филм. След Мила от Марс, Прогноза, Modus Vivendi, Смъртта и целият път обратно и още 5 телевизионни сериала, включително историческия Дървото на живота, един театрален спектакъл, 17 филмови награди и участие в над 100 кино фестивала, сега събра тази чета:

  • Оператор е българо-колумбиецът Крум Луис-Алирио Родригес, звезда в бранша, с 11 пълнометражни филма, 16 късометражни, 250 реклами и музикални клипа. Бавно говори, бързо мисли, винаги има мнение, боец.
  • Художник е Паоло Фаенци, италианец роден в Африка, живее от години в България, построил едни от най-красивите декори в Киноцентъра, колекционер, артист с размах и почерк.
  • Марта Миронска, костюмен художник, кино-ветеран с душа на дете.
  • Вики Радославова, монтажист, почти дете със стаж на ветеран - 6 сериала и 2 филма, а само преди 2 седмици завърши НАТФИЗ.
  • Кайно Йесно Слонце - музика и то каква! https://www.facebook.com/kaynoyesnoslonce?fref=ts
  • Актьорите, великолепни, са представяни един по един ТУК: https://www.facebook.com/voevodathefilm#

OUR GANG

is also led by a woman. Zornitsa Sophia is a writer/director of Voevoda. It's her 5th feature lenght film after Mila from Mars, Forecast, Modus Vivendi, Death and All the Way Back (watch here: www.netcinema.bg), 5 TV series, The Tree Of Life hystorical one among them. After all these, one theater play, 60 exhibitions, 17 film awards and over 100 film festivals, now she has gathered the following gang:

  • Krum Luis-Alirio Rodriguez is our Cinematographer, a star in his universe, DOP of 11 feature films, 16 shorts, 250 music videos and commercials. Talks slowly, thinks fast and always has an opinion. A fighter.
  • Paolo Faenzi is our Production Designer, an Italian born in Africa, living in Bulgaria, author of the most beautiful sets in Boyana Cinema Center, a collector and an artist, with a purpose and scope. 
  • Marta Mironska, Costume Designer, a cinema veteran with the soul of a child.
  • Vicky Radoslavova, Editor, almost a kid with a CV of a veteran - 6 TV series, 2 films, this is her third and she just gradiated from Film Academy.
  • Kayno Yesno Slonce - music, oh, what a music! https://www.facebook.com/kaynoyesnoslonce?fref=ts
  • The ACTORS are presented HERE: https://www.facebook.com/voevodathefilm#


КАК СЕ ПРАВИ ТАКЪВ ФИЛМ

Франсис Форд Копола казва, че правенето на филм е като рисуване с армия. 

За да се случи точно такъв филм е необходима просто чета сърцати хора. Работим с консултанти-историци, колекционери, родолюбци от форум Традиция и съвременни "хайдушки" чети. Всеки автентичен детайл от филма изисква отношение: ятагани и каракулаци, преднопълнещи пушки, носии, къщи. За да  пренесем зрителите в 19 век.

Изборът на актьори се оказа малко като избор за истински хайдути! Издирвахме изненадващи, неочаквани лица, някои дори са непрофесионалисти. Те вече  репетират и тренират в лагер с потури и цървули - езда, стрелба или просто тичане по баира със силях с по 7 кила оръжия в него.

HOW IS SUCH A FILM PRODUCED

Francis Ford Coppola says: filmmaking is like painting with an army.

It takes an enthusiastic tribe to create such a film. We work with consultants, historians, collectors and fans of Bulgarian traditions, who really amaze us with the fire they carry in their hearts, just like the 19c. rebels did. Every little detail in this film requires attention: we have to restore original weaponry, traditional costumes and houses... so they work as a "time machine".

The casting was a little bit like casting for real rebels. We searched for surprising faces, some of them even non-professionals. They already rehearse and train in a special camp dressed in 19c. clothes: shooting, riding or just running uphill, carrying 7 kilo weapons.

ЗА КАКВО СА НИ ТЕЗИ СРЕДСТВА

Основната част от финансирането на филма е осигурена със спечелването на държавна субсидия от Национален Филмов Център, ко-продуцентите Дрийм Тийм Филмс и нови партньори и спонсори с жар в сърцето. Но исторически филми се правят рядко по очевидни причини. Една част от бюджета все още липсва. С наличният - филмът ще бъде заснет в убийствен снимачен график, при който раните няма да са само грим по актьорите. Всеки лев е от значение за качеството!

НАШАТА ЦЕЛ: При събирането на 90,000$ с твоя помощ компромиси няма да има и ще спасиш екипа от унищожение!

ЕКСТРА ЦЕЛ 1: Ако ни помогнеш да съберем 140,000$, ще разполагаме с 3 дни повече снимачно време за екшън сцените, а оттам - с повече каскади и изненади!

ЕКСТРА ЦЕЛ 2: Ако с твоя помощ съберем 150,000$, заедно ще вдигнем отново падналия от снеговете 4 метров дувар на училището в архитектурен резерват Жеравна, понастоящем галерия, а през септември - декор във филма Воевода. За да остане нещо след нас!

Освен с добро дело можеш да се похвалиш на своите другари и с хайдушки ДАРОВЕ от филма, виж вдясно: PERKS!

Очакваме те в четата! Заедно с теб ще направим този филм специален.

WHAT DO WE NEED THIS MONEY FOR

The film won funding from the Bulgarian National Film Center and is also backed up by co-producers Dream Team Films and generous partners and sponsors. But period films in Bulgaria are rare for a reason. We are still missing a small but necessary part of the budget. Every single dollar counts! With the current budget VOEVODA will be shot in an impossible schedule. Scars will not be only actors’ make-up, we are afraid.

OUR GOAL: When your contributions reach 90,000$ - the quality rises with no compromises! And you will be saving the crew!  

STRETCH GOAL 1: If you help us get to 140,000$, we will have 3 more days for  shooting the battle scenes. Invest in more action and surprises!

STRETCH GOAL 2: If you help us get to 150,000$ together we will restore part of the 200 y.o. primary school in Zheravna Cultural Reserve, that could not live through the last winter snow. Once a school, now - a gallery, in September - a film set. And it will last after us!

You can do good now and tell all your friends about it. And apart from the good karma, you can get rebellious PERKS in return – check them to the right and below!

Join the gang! Let's make this film special!

ДАРОВЕ за хайдути

И най-малката помощ е важна за нас. Ако те вълнува нашият проект, направи го и свой. Дарувай според възможностите си и ще бъдеш дарен! Избери си дар(ове) в дясно, подробности по-долу.


GANG-PERKS

Even the smallest contribution is of importance for us. If our project moves you, make it also your project by giving and you will be given in return. Choose a perk or more to the right, more details you can find below.

ДАР ЕТНО ТЕНИСКА ВОЕВОДА

Четата ни си има оригинална униформа, която ще имаш и ти! С дизайнера Мира Бъчварова сътворихме тениски с традиционни елементи за времето, през което не сме по хайдушки премени. Пафти за жените, пълен силях - хайдушки кожен колан за оръжие - за мъжете – освен етно красотата, древните български символи имат сила, която пази енергията на тялото в най-важната му част.

ETHNO T-SHIRTS VOEVODA

Our gang has its crew uniform and now you also have it! We created these unique T-shirts with traditional Bulgarian elements to wear something while not in period costumes with the help of designer Mira Bachvarova. For women – pafti decoration and fully equipted silyah (Bulgarian baldric) for men. Apart from reviving the traditional beauty of these decorations, we use the power of the ancient symbols they carry and convey it to the body at its most important parts.

ДАР ЕДИН ВЪЗРОЖДЕНСКИ НАКИТ

Автентичните накити от 19в. се намират вече само в колекциите на фенове на българските традиции. Някога майсторите правили нещата така, че да издържат вечно, а символиката им е архаична и магическа. Гривна–рогатка, или трепка, или наушник, или дамски брачен накит – според наличностите... Даряваме те с уникат-накит срещу помощта ти и се радваме, че отива в ръце, които творят добро.

ANTIQUE FEMALE JEWERLY

These are authentic treasures from the 19 c.,which nowadays are only to find in the hands of collectors. They are exquisitely crafted to last forever, the way things were made in the old days and bring magic to the lady, who wears them. Rogatka-bracelet or trepka or earpiece or bride jewelry – upon availability... Your help is priceless for us and we are happy to give you such a treasure in return. We believe it goes in a hand that creates good.

ДАР ЖЕНСКИ/МЪЖКИ КОСТЮМ "ИГРАЛ" ВЪВ ФИЛМА

Български автентични над 100 годишни носии, вече на изчезване. Златната сърма, с която са извезани женските, вече не се произвежда. Дълговечните им символи и красота днес са грубо стилизирани в кичозни подобия. Можеш заедно с нас да спасиш ИСТИНСКА ДРЕХА ОТ СТАРИ ВРЕМЕНА и да се грижиш за нея с уважението, което й се полага. И да блеснеш сред гостите!

AN AUTHENTIC COSTUME FROM THE FILM

Тhese are genuine Bulgarian traditional garments from the 19c., embroidered with golden thread, nowhere to be found today. During the last century, their ancient symbolic and beauty have been manipulated into kitsch custom clothes. Together with us you can save an AUTHENTIC GARMENT FROM OLD TIMES and take care of it with the due respect, shining in it at appropriate events.

ДАР СИЛЯХ С ЕДИН ХАЙДУШКИ РЕКВИЗИТ-ИЗНЕНАДА

Силяхът е стар кожен пояс с прегради за поставяне на оръжие и хайдушки потреби. Пази мъжкия кръст от студа и злобата на света. Доверени майстори ръчно изработват силяси за филма и коват ключови елементи от реквизита на хайдутите. Даряваш безценна помощ всичко това да се случва! Свържи се с нас за подробности за своя допълнителен СПЕЦИАЛЕН ДАР ЗА СИЛЯХА-ИЗНЕНАДА!

BULGARIAN REBEL BALDRIC 'SILYAH' + SURPRISE-FILM-PROP

Silyah is the name of the leather belt of the ancient Bulgarian rebels. For centuries it has guarded man's body from the cold and evil of the day and night.  Today we revive this tradition and our craftsmen create these exactly the way they were hand-crafted centuries ago. This all happens with your priceless help! Contact us for more information about the surprise-film-prop that goes with it.

ДАР ДИЗАЙНЕРСКO ВЕЧЕРНO ОБЛЕКЛО С ЕТНО МОТИВИ

Тук можеш да срещнеш миналото с бъдещето! Българските гайтани, шевици и накити в завладяващ модерен прочит в модата на Мира Бъчварова. Избери между  ДИЗАЙНЕРСКА РОКЛЯ ИЛИ ПАЛТО, ушити специално за теб по твой размер .


A TOP FASHION ETHNO GARMENT DESIGNED by Mira Bachvarova. 

Here you connect with the past and the future of Bulgaria. The beauty and symbolic power of the traditional embroidery patterns: gaitani, shevitza and pafti decoration are interpreted in a modern top fashion creations by the famous Bulgarian designer Mira Bachvarova. You can choose between a coat and an evening dress, tailored specially for you. www.mirabachvarova.com

...........................................................................

Пощенските разходи за получаването на предметните дарове не са включени, понеже не знаем дали сте в Пловдив, Лондон, Чикаго или Тринидад и Тобаго. Ще се радваме да ви предадем специалния ви дар лично, в София след уговорка или да ви го изпратим на ваши разноски по начина, който ви е най-удобен.

Shipping costs for the object-perks are not included as we can't be certain if you reside in Plovdiv, London, Chicago or Trinidad and Tobago. We will be happy to give you your special perk/s in person, upon agreement in Sofia or we will send it to you at your expense in the way most convenient for you.

За награди свързани със снимачния период, който е 25.08.-30.09: ще ви информираме за точната дата, с която участниците ще трябва да се съобразят.

For perks connected to the filming which is 25.08.-30.09: We will let you know the specific dates by the end of July. You cannot change them.

КАК ОЩЕ МОЖЕШ ДА ПОМОГНЕШ

Ако сега не можеш да помогнеш, но сърце хайдушко не трае, пак има път: последвай ни във FACEBOOK.com/voevodathefilm и Instagram, разкажи на бойните си другари и споделяй каузата ни!

Ако пък имаш ФИРМА и сакаш да видиш лицето й в надписите на Филма - пиши ни на  voevoda.crowdfunding@gmail.com и стани един от воеводите!

HOW YOU COULD HELP MORE

You want to support this film so damn much, but you have no budget for it in the next 50 days - there are still ways to help out: Follow us on FACEBOOK.com/voevodathefilm and Instagram, tell all your dear friends about it and share our CAUSE!

Or if you have a company and you want to see its LOGO in the films titles - write us at voevoda.crowdfunding@gmail.com to hear how this can be done.

КАК СЕ СЛУЧВАТ НЕЩАТА ВЪВ ВРЕМЕТО       PRODUCTION AND PERKS SCHEDULE

Промени в графиците са възможни, но ще бъдете надлежно уведомени ТУК.               If there are changes in the schedule, but you will be dully informed HERE.
story_txt:
TOВА НЕ Е ПРОСТО ФИЛМ, А КАУЗА.Борим се да
съживим парченца българско наследство, застрашено от забвение. Ела в четата, помогни да направим филма по-як!Румена е воевода на бунтовна чета в бруталния мъжки
свят на 19 в. Принудена да напусне домашно огнище, тя открива бореца в себе си
на сурова цена. Филм за отстояването, за воеводството и борбите на една майка.



ИСТИНСКА ИСТОРИЯ ПО РАЗКАЗ НА КЛАСИКА НИКОЛАЙ ХАЙТОВ.     СНИМКИ: ЕСЕН 2015. ПО ЕКРАНИТЕ: ЗИМА 2016/2017.

      


IT IS NOT JUST A FILM. IT IS A CAUSE.
We strive to revive
bits of Bulgarian heritage threatened with oblivion.Join the gang, please help us make this film better! Roumena is a leader (voevoda) of a rebelious gang in the brutal men's world of 19th century. Forced to leave home she discovers the fighter in herself but she has to pay the price. A film about standing up for one's choices and about chieftainship through the struggles of a mother.

BASED ON REAL CHARACTERS AND A SHORT STORY BY                        BULGARIAN CLASSIC WRITER NIKOLAY HAITOV.                                                     SHOOTING: FALL 2015. RELEASE: WINTER 2016/2017.
СКЪПИ ПРИЯТЕЛЮ, вярваме, че не трябва да оставим уникални истории да потънат в забрава. 
Знаеш 
ли, че България има женски аналог на Робин Худ и Уилям Уолъс? Не една, а над 50 жени оставят хурка и грабват пушка в борба за справедливост и нито една не става редови хайдутин, а всички - воеводи на мъжки чети. Николай Хайтов, по чийто разказ е написан сценарият, нарича това феномен.Подготвяме се
5 години за да направим автентичен хайдушки филм и в течение на работата открихме вселена, която искаме да съхраним и споделим. Заедно с теб!Ако припознаваш каузите ни за свои и имаш кредитна карта или дебитна VISA карта или ползваш PayPal, можеш да избереш вдясно КАК да станем съратници. Сумите за различните нива не са цени за включените артикули, а степени на ДАРИТЕЛСТВО с цел до-финансиране на ВОЕВОДА. Тематичните дарове или спомени от филма са знак за нашата ПРИЗНАТЕЛНОСТ към всеки един от вас.
Има два начина да дарите:- чрез кликване върху
предпочетен от вас ДАР - може да ги намерите изброени в квадратчета в дясно.- директно през бутона
CONTRIBUTE NOW без да избирате ДАР - посочените там 5 USD, 10 USD или 100 USD
са примерни и може да въведете друго, каквото ви е по сърце. 
И при двете опции не е
необходимо да имате регистрация в IndieGOGO, системата ще ви поиска емайл адрес
или facebook, за да може да ви изпрати потвърждение-разписка. Плащането отнема
около минута като дарението може да се направи анонимно или пък името ви да се
почете в списъка FUNDERS тук.
IndieGOGO ви
предлага опция за публикуване на новината и линк към кампанията на стената ви
във facebook
при финализиране на плащането – избирайки я вие помагате каузата да достигне
повече хора!DEAR FRIEND,
We believe that we should not let exceptional stories fall
in oblivion. 
Did you know Bulgaria had female analogues
of Robin Hood and William Wallace? Not one or two,
but more than 50 women fought for justice and became not just regular rebels, but leaders of gangs - voevodas. A phenomenon
few know about.
We've been developing this film for 5 years now to make it authentic as to reawaken
the drama of Roumena Voevoda in a gritty realistic way. And in the course we've discovered an inspiring universe we want to share with the world. With your help! 
If you feel for our cause and you have a credit card or
a VISA Electron debit card or you are a PayPal user - you can choose a way to join it to the right. Please
note that the prices at the different levels are not market prices but
the DONATIONS you can make to contribute to making VOEVODA film better. We give these perks out as a sign of our GRATITUDE and in return of your
help!
There are
two ways to contribute:
- By
clicking on a preferred PERK – you can find them all listed to the right.
- Directly by
clicking on the CONTRIBUTE NOW button (without selecting a PERK) – the shown there
5 USD, 10USD or 100 USD are indicative and may enter another amount of your
choosing.
You do not
need to an IndieGOGO account to use any of these options. The payment takes
about a minute and the system will ask for an email address or facebook login
in order to send you a receipt. The donation can be made anonymously or your
name will appear in the list of funders here. IndieGOGO gives you the option to
share the news of your donation and a link to the campaign on your facebook
timeline – by choosing it you will be helping the cause to reach even more
people!ТОЗИ ФИЛМ E

за отстояването.

Румена Воeвода е реална историческа личност. Преди век и
половина, все едно е днес, тя се бори да помири мъжките с женските си качества,
бунтовника - с майката и любимата, в конфликт с нормите на обществото и на
собствените си другари. Как  се превръща шайката разбойници в
робин-худовци? Ако
отстояването на себе си ти коства най-скъпото, би ли платил цената?THIS IS A FILM ABOUT...standing up.
Roumena Voevoda is a real person from 19th century Bulgaria. 150 years ago, as if it is today, she strives to reconcile the warrior and the female nature within herself, the fighter - with the mother and the lover against the status quo and her own comrades. What  transforms the outlaw thugs into Robin-Hood-type of fighters? If standing up for your choices comes at a dear price, would you pay it?ТОЗИ ФИЛМ НЕ...
...следва клишето ‘хайдути се борят с турци
и мюсюлмани’. Интересува ни отношението чoвeк-човек. Не в един случай от историята свой - свой убива, а ръка се подава и от враг - с респект.
...ползва бутафорен реквизит, оръжия и
стилизирани носии. С помощта на ентусиасти и колекционери на съкровища от Възраждането - съвременни хайдути - ние възстановяваме истински реликви и умения от време оно. 
...е холивудски екшън със супер герои и огромни масовки. Нашите герои са земни и корави, а повечето ни актьори са или малко познати лица, или хора от живота, които ще видим за първи път на екран.
THIS FILM IS NOT ABOUT......the cliche rebels fight against the Ottomans only. We are interested in the human relationships. Not once in history the traitor was once a friend and an enemy becomes an ally - out of respect....artificial props, costumes and weapons. With the help of collectors who will take part in the film - we restore real treasures of national heritage. ...copying Hollywood action with super heroes and giant battle scenes. We feature down-to-earth characters and actors mostly unknown and fresh for the big screen.


НАШАТА ЧЕТА
също се предвожда от жена. Зорница София е
режисьор на Воевода. Това е петият й филм. След Мила от Марс,
Прогноза, Modus Vivendi, Смъртта и целият път
обратно и още 5 телевизионни сериала, включително историческия Дървото на живота, един театрален спектакъл,
17 филмови награди и участие в над 100 кино фестивала, сега събра тази чета: 
Оператор е българо-колумбиецът Крум Луис-Алирио Родригес, звезда в бранша, с 11 пълнометражни филма, 16 късометражни, 250 реклами и музикални клипа. Бавно говори, бързо мисли, винаги има мнение, боец.

Художник е Паоло Фаенци, италианец роден в Африка, живее от години в България, построил едни от най-красивите декори в Киноцентъра, колекционер, артист с размах и почерк.

Марта Миронска, костюмен художник, кино-ветеран с душа на дете.

Вики Радославова, монтажист, почти дете със стаж на ветеран - 6 сериала и 2 филма, а само преди 2 седмици завърши НАТФИЗ.

Кайно Йесно Слонце - музика и то каква! https://www.facebook.com/kaynoyesnoslonce?fref=ts

Актьорите, великолепни, са представяни един по един ТУК: https://www.facebook.com/voevodathefilm#

OUR GANG

is also led by a woman. Zornitsa Sophia is a writer/director of Voevoda. It's her 5th feature lenght film after Mila from Mars, Forecast, Modus Vivendi, Death and All the Way Back (watch here: www.netcinema.bg), 5 TV series, The Tree Of Life hystorical one among them. After all these, one theater play, 60 exhibitions, 17 film awards and over 100 film festivals, now she has gathered the following gang:

Krum Luis-Alirio Rodriguez is our Cinematographer, a star in his universe, DOP of 11 feature films, 16 shorts, 250 music videos and commercials. Talks slowly, thinks fast and always has an opinion. A fighter.


Paolo Faenzi is our Production Designer, an Italian born in Africa, living in Bulgaria, author of the most beautiful sets in Boyana Cinema Center, a collector and an artist, with a purpose and scope. 


Marta Mironska, Costume Designer, a cinema veteran with the soul of a child.


Vicky Radoslavova, Editor, almost a kid with a CV of a veteran - 6 TV series, 2 films, this is her third and she just gradiated from Film Academy.


Kayno Yesno Slonce - music, oh, what a music! https://www.facebook.com/kaynoyesnoslonce?fref=ts


The ACTORS are presented HERE: https://www.facebook.com/voevodathefilm#


КАК СЕ ПРАВИ ТАКЪВ ФИЛМ

Франсис Форд Копола казва, че правенето на филм е като рисуване с армия. За да се случи точно такъв филм е необходима просто чета
сърцати хора. Работим с
консултанти-историци, колекционери, родолюбци от форум Традиция и съвременни "хайдушки" чети. Всеки автентичен детайл
от филма изисква отношение:
ятагани и каракулаци, преднопълнещи пушки, носии, къщи. За да  пренесем зрителите в 19 век.Изборът на актьори се оказа малко като избор за истински хайдути! Издирвахме изненадващи, неочаквани лица, някои дори са непрофесионалисти. Те вече  репетират и тренират в лагер с потури и цървули - езда, стрелба или просто тичане по баира със силях с по 7 кила оръжия в него.HOW IS SUCH A FILM PRODUCEDFrancis Ford Coppola says: filmmaking is like painting with an army.It takes an enthusiastic tribe to create such a film. We work with consultants, historians, collectors and fans of Bulgarian traditions, who really amaze us with the fire they carry in their hearts, just like the 19c. rebels did. Every little detail in this film requires attention: we have to restore original weaponry, traditional costumes and houses... so they work as a "time machine".The casting was a little bit like casting for real rebels. We searched for surprising faces, some of them even non-professionals. They already rehearse and train in a special camp dressed in 19c. clothes: shooting, riding or just running uphill, carrying 7 kilo weapons.ЗА КАКВО СА НИ ТЕЗИ СРЕДСТВА
Основната част от финансирането на филма е осигурена със спечелването на
държавна субсидия от Национален Филмов Център, ко-продуцентите Дрийм Тийм Филмс и нови партньори и спонсори с жар в сърцето. Но
